#Statue of Peace: Statue Installed in Glendale, the United States
country_event = {
	id = mdmosjap_japan.250730000
	title = mdmosjap_japan.250730000.t
	desc = mdmosjap_japan.250730000.d
	#picture = GFX_news_event_hearts_of_iron_4

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		KOR = {
			exists = yes
			NOT = { is_puppet_of = JAP }
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = mdmosjap_japan.250730000.oA
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japan.250730000.oA"
		reverse_add_opinion_modifier = { target = KOR modifier = mdmosjap_opinion_KOR_statue_of_peace_established }
		if = {
			limit = { JAP = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_STATUE_OF_PEACE_PROTEST } }
			JAP = { country_event = { id = mdmosjap_japan.250730001 days = 1 } }
		}
	}
}

#Statue of Peace: Koreans in USA established Confort Woman's Statue
country_event = {
	id = mdmosjap_japan.250730001
	title = mdmosjap_japan.250730001.t
	desc = mdmosjap_japan.250730001.d
	#picture = GFX_news_event_hearts_of_iron_4

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	#Protest
	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				OR = {
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 3 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 4 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 5 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 17 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 18 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 19 }
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		name = mdmosjap_japan.250730001.oA
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japan.250730001.oA"
		mdmosjap_increase_party_popularity_array_0_var_2 = yes
		mdmosjap_increase_party_popularity_array_1_var_2 = yes
		mdmosjap_increase_party_popularity_array_6_var_2 = yes
		mdmosjap_increase_party_popularity_array_7_var_2 = yes
		mdmosjap_increase_party_popularity_array_13_var_2 = yes
		mdmosjap_increase_party_popularity_array_15_var_2 = yes
		mdmosjap_increase_party_popularity_array_20_var_1 = yes
		mdmosjap_increase_party_popularity_array_21_var_1 = yes
		increase_mdmosjap_conrad_left_2 = yes
		increase_mdmosjap_conrad_right_1 = yes
		KOR = { country_event = { id = mdmosjap_japan.250730002 days = 1 } }
		USA = { country_event = { id = mdmosjap_japan.250730003 days = 1 } }
		if = {
			limit = { JAP = { has_opinion_modifier = mdmosjap_opinion_KOR_statue_of_peace_2 } }
			hidden_effect = {
				remove_opinion_modifier = { target = KOR modifier = mdmosjap_opinion_KOR_statue_of_peace_2 }
				add_opinion_modifier = { target = KOR modifier = mdmosjap_opinion_KOR_statue_of_peace_3 }
			}
			set_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_OPINION_MODIFIER_JAP_KOR_DIPLOMATIC_CONFLICT
		}
		if = {
			limit = { JAP = { has_opinion_modifier = mdmosjap_opinion_KOR_statue_of_peace_1 } }
			hidden_effect = {
				remove_opinion_modifier = { target = KOR modifier = mdmosjap_opinion_KOR_statue_of_peace_1 }
				add_opinion_modifier = { target = KOR modifier = mdmosjap_opinion_KOR_statue_of_peace_2 }
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = MDMOSJAP_OPINION_MODIFIER_ANTI_SOUTH_KOREA_FOR_STATUE_TT
	}

	#Accept
	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				OR = {
					is_historical_focus_on = yes
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 0 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 1 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 6 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 7 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 13 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 14 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 15 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 20 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 21 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 22 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 23 }
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		name = mdmosjap_japan.250730001.oB
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japan.250730001.oB"
		mdmosjap_increase_party_popularity_array_2_var_2 = yes
		mdmosjap_increase_party_popularity_array_3_var_2 = yes
		mdmosjap_increase_party_popularity_array_4_var_1 = yes
		mdmosjap_increase_party_popularity_array_5_var_1 = yes
		mdmosjap_increase_party_popularity_array_14_var_2 = yes
		mdmosjap_increase_party_popularity_array_17_var_2 = yes
		mdmosjap_increase_party_popularity_array_18_var_2 = yes
		mdmosjap_increase_party_popularity_array_19_var_1 = yes
		increase_mdmosjap_conrad_left_1 = yes
		increase_mdmosjap_conrad_right_2 = yes
	}
}

#Takako Doi Has Passed Away
country_event = {
	id = mdmosjap_japan.260921001
	title = mdmosjap_japan.260921001.t
	desc = mdmosjap_japan.260921001.d
	#picture = GFX_news_event_hearts_of_iron_4

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = mdmosjap_japan.260921001.oA
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japan.260921001.oA"
		set_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_RETIREMENT_TAKAKO_DOI
		custom_effect_tooltip = MDMOSJAP_RETIREMENT_TAKAKO_DOI_TT
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_leader = { name = "Takako Doi" } }
			kill_country_leader = yes
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Interim Cabinet" picture = "leader_the_diet.dds" ideology = socialism
				traits = { interim_cabinet }
			}
			add_stability = -0.02

			changepm_mdmosjap_JAP_candidates_remedy_for_SDP = yes	#Remedy for vacancy of candidates on the SDP

			changepm_mdmosjap_JAP_addflag_resignation = yes			#Make a flag for the resignation of P.M.
			changepm_mdmosjap_JAP_prime_minister_election = yes		#Choose the next Prime Minister
		}
	}
}

#Start 2014 Lower House General Election
country_event = {
	id = mdmosjap_japan.261121001
	title = mdmosjap_japan.261121001.t
	desc = mdmosjap_japan.261121001.d
	picture = GFX_eventpic_mdmosjap_jap_election

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		JAP = { NOT = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_STATE_OF_EMERGENCY_SENTENCED } }
	}

	immediate = {
		set_variable = { mdmosjap_JAP_var_ElectionPeriod = 23 }		#Election's Duration
	}

	id = mdmosjap_japan.290209103
	title = mdmosjap_japan.290209103.t
	desc = mdmosjap_japan.290209103.d
	#picture = GFX_news_event_hearts_of_iron_4

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	#[Root.GetRulingParty] Denied it
	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 99
		}
		name = mdmosjap_japan.290209103.oA
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japan.290209103.oA"
		add_stability = -0.01
		add_political_power = -50
		increase_mdmosjap_conrad_left_1 = yes
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_SHINZO_ABE_ISHIN }
			mdmosjap_decrease_party_popularity_array_6_var_2 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_SHINZO_ABE_ISHIN } }
			mdmosjap_decrease_party_popularity_array_7_var_2 = yes
		}
		mdmosjap_increase_party_popularity_array_2_var_1 = yes
		mdmosjap_increase_party_popularity_array_3_var_1 = yes
		mdmosjap_increase_party_popularity_array_5_var_1 = yes
		mdmosjap_increase_party_popularity_array_14_var_1 = yes
		mdmosjap_increase_party_popularity_array_15_var_1 = yes
		ROOT = { country_event = { id = mdmosjap_japan.290209104 days = 18 } }
		ROOT = { country_event = { id = mdmosjap_japan.290209106 days = 45 } }
	}

	#[Root.GetRulingParty] Accepted it
	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				is_historical_focus_on = yes
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		name = mdmosjap_japan.290209103.oB
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japan.290209103.oB"
	#	add_stability = 0.01
		add_political_power = -200
		increase_mdmosjap_conrad_left_1 = yes
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_SHINZO_ABE_ISHIN }
			mdmosjap_decrease_party_popularity_array_6_var_1 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_SHINZO_ABE_ISHIN } }
			mdmosjap_decrease_party_popularity_array_7_var_1 = yes
		}
		mdmosjap_increase_party_popularity_array_2_var_05 = yes
		mdmosjap_increase_party_popularity_array_3_var_05 = yes
		mdmosjap_increase_party_popularity_array_5_var_05 = yes

		mdmosjap_increase_party_popularity_array_15_var_05 = yes

country_event = {

	desc = mdmosjap_japan.290601001.d
	#picture = GFX_news_event_hearts_of_iron_4

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		JAP = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_AKIHITOS_OKOTOBA }
	}

	#We should maintain the legacy of chrysanthemum throne

			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				OR = {
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 2 }

				factor = 0.1
			}
			modifier = {
				OR = {
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 3 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 4 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 5 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 8 }

				factor = 0
			}
		}

		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japan.290601001.oA"
		mdmosjap_increase_party_popularity_array_0_var_1 = yes

				factor = 0
			}

					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 0 }

			}

	}

	option = {
		name = mdmosjap_japan.banzaidissolution
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japan.120602001.oA"
		increase_mdmosjap_conrad_left_1 = yes
		increase_mdmosjap_conrad_right_1 = yes

		if = {
			limit = { has_government = democratic }
			set_politics = {
				ruling_party = democratic
				last_election = "2021.10.31" election_frequency = 48 elections_allowed = yes
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_government = communism }
			set_politics = {
				ruling_party = communism
				last_election = "2021.10.31" election_frequency = 48 elections_allowed = yes
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_government = fascism }
			set_politics = {
				ruling_party = fascism
				last_election = "2021.10.31" election_frequency = 48 elections_allowed = yes
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_government = neutrality }
			set_politics = {
				ruling_party = neutrality
				last_election = "2021.10.31" election_frequency = 48 elections_allowed = yes
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_government = nationalist }
			set_politics = {
				ruling_party = nationalist
				last_election = "2021.10.31" election_frequency = 48 elections_allowed = yes
			}
		}

		election_mdmosjap_JAP_hold_election = yes					#MUST PUT THIS SCRIPT EFFECT BELOW THE SETTING OF DURATION VARIABLE
	}
}

#\"Unfreedom of Expression\"

	id = mdmosjap_japan.310803001
	title = mdmosjap_japan.310803001.t
	desc = mdmosjap_japan.310803001.d
	#picture = GFX_news_event_hearts_of_iron_4

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	#Accuse the exhibition
	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				OR = {
					is_historical_focus_on = yes
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 2 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 3 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 5 }
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		name = mdmosjap_japan.310803001.oA
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japan.310803001.oA"
		increase_mdmosjap_conrad_left_2 = yes
		increase_mdmosjap_conrad_right_1 = yes
	}

	#Neutral
	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 80
			modifier = {
				OR = {
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 2 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 3 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 5 }
					has_government = nationalist
				}
				factor = 0.025
			}
		}
		name = mdmosjap_japan.310803001.oB
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japan.310803001.oB"
		increase_mdmosjap_conrad_left_3 = yes
		increase_mdmosjap_conrad_right_2 = yes
	}

	#Defend the exhibition
	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				OR = {
					is_historical_focus_on = yes
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 6 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 7 }
					has_government = nationalist
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}

		add_political_power = -10
		decrease_mdmosjap_conrad_left_1 = yes
		increase_mdmosjap_conrad_right_5 = yes
	}
}

	#No

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 60
		}
		name = mdmosjap_japan.320828005.oB
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japan.320828005.oB"
		add_political_power = -100
		if = {
			limit = { is_in_array = { ruling_party = 0 } }
			mdmosjap_increase_party_popularity_array_0_var_10 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { is_in_array = { ruling_party = 1 } }
			mdmosjap_increase_party_popularity_array_1_var_10 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { is_in_array = { ruling_party = 7 } }
			mdmosjap_increase_party_popularity_array_7_var_10 = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = { remove_mission = coalition_countdown }
		set_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_LDP_JIP_COALITION_NO
	}

	#Yes
	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 40
			modifier = {
				is_historical_focus_on = yes
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		name = mdmosjap_japan.320828005.oA
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japan.320828005.oA"
		add_political_power = -50
		add_to_array = { gov_coalition_array = 6 }
		mdmosjap_increase_party_popularity_array_6_var_10 = yes
		hidden_effect = { remove_mission = coalition_countdown }
		set_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_LDP_JIP_COALITION_YES
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = mdmosjap_japan.321114001
	title = mdmosjap_japan.321114001.t
	desc = mdmosjap_japan.321114001.d
	#picture = GFX_news_event_hearts_of_iron_4

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		JAP = {
			OR = {
				is_in_array = { ruling_party = 0 }
				is_in_array = { ruling_party = 1 }
				is_in_array = { ruling_party = 6 }
				is_in_array = { ruling_party = 7 }
				is_in_array = { ruling_party = 14 }
				has_government = nationalist
			}
			NOT = { has_country_leader = { name = "Shinzo Abe" } }
			has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_RIKKEN
			NOT = { is_in_array = { ruling_party = 2 } }
			NOT = { is_in_array = { ruling_party = 3 } }
			NOT = { is_in_array = { gov_coalition_array = 3 } }
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			set_temp_variable = { mdmosjap_JAP_temp_var_SDPbreakupCALC_toCDP = party_pop_array^3 }
			set_temp_variable = { mdmosjap_JAP_temp_var_SDPbreakupCALC_toSDP = party_pop_array^3 }
			multiply_temp_variable = { mdmosjap_JAP_temp_var_SDPbreakupCALC_toCDP = 0.8 }
			multiply_temp_variable = { mdmosjap_JAP_temp_var_SDPbreakupCALC_toSDP = 0.2 }
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = mdmosjap_japan.321114001.oA
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japan.321114001.oA"

		set_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_SDP_BREAKUP

		hidden_effect = {
			add_to_variable = { party_pop_array^2 = mdmosjap_JAP_temp_var_SDPbreakupCALC_toCDP }
			set_variable = { party_pop_array^3 = mdmosjap_JAP_temp_var_SDPbreakupCALC_toSDP }
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_SDP_BREAKUP_CALC_TT

		hidden_effect = { recalculate_party = yes update_government_coalition_strength = yes update_party_name = yes set_coalition_drift = yes }
	}
}

			swap_ideas = { remove_idea = police_04 add_idea = police_05 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = police_03 }
			swap_ideas = { remove_idea = police_03 add_idea = police_04 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = police_02 }
			swap_ideas = { remove_idea = police_02 add_idea = police_03 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = police_01 }
			swap_ideas = { remove_idea = police_01 add_idea = police_03 }
		}
		if = {

#[HIDDEN] Obuchi-Ozawa Negotiation Result Check
country_event = {
	id = mdmosjap_japan_kato.54
	hidden = yes

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		set_variable = { mdmosjap_2000_ldp_lp_negotiation_rejected_penalty = mdmosjap_2000_ldp_lp_negotiation_rejected_count }
		multiply_variable = { mdmosjap_2000_ldp_lp_negotiation_rejected_penalty = -150 }
	}


	option = {
		name = mdmosjap_japan_kato.54.oA
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japan_kato.54.oA"
		if = {			#Collapse of Ji-Ji-Ko Coalition
			limit = {
				OR = {
					check_variable = { mdmosjap_2000_ldp_lp_negotiation_rejected_count > 2 }
					check_variable = { mdmosjap_2000_ldp_lp_negotiation_rejected_count = 2 }
					has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_2000_LDP_LP_NEGOTIATION_CONTRAINDICANT_OPTION
				}
			}
			country_event = mdmosjap_japan_kato.55
		} else = {		#LP Remains in the Coalition
			country_event = mdmosjap_japan_kato.56
		}
	}
}

#[HIDDEN] Election Result Check
country_event = {
	id = mdmosjap_japan_kato.15
	hidden = yes

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	#LDP Lost The Election
	option = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = { is_in_array = { ruling_party = 0 } }
			NOT = { is_in_array = { ruling_party = 1 } }
			NOT = { is_in_array = { ruling_party = 7 } }
		}
		name = mdmosjap_japan_kato.15.oA
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japan_kato.15.oA"
		country_event = mdmosjap_japan_kato.16
	}

	#LDP Won The Election
	option = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				is_in_array = { ruling_party = 0 }
				is_in_array = { ruling_party = 1 }
				is_in_array = { ruling_party = 7 }
			}
		}
		name = mdmosjap_japan_kato.15.oB
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japan_kato.15.oB"
		country_event = mdmosjap_japan_kato.17
	}
}

		set_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_KATO_REBELLION_SUCCESS
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_LP }
				OR = {
					NOT = { is_in_array = { gov_coalition_array = 6 } }
					NOT = { is_in_array = { gov_coalition_array = 15 } }
				}
			}
			country_event = { id = mdmosjap_japan_kato.18 days = 3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_LP
				NOT = { is_in_array = { gov_coalition_array = 6 } }
			}
			country_event = { id = mdmosjap_japan_kato.19 days = 3 }
		}
	}
}

#Scandal of Koichi Kato (Mutually With mdmosjap_japan.140402001)
country_event = {
	id = mdmosjap_japan_kato.801
	title = mdmosjap_japan_kato.801.t
	desc = mdmosjap_japan_kato.801.d
	#picture = GFX_news_event_hearts_of_iron_4

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		set_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_KATO_ONCE_QUIT_FROM_DIET
	}

	#Kato must resign
	option = {
		ai_chance = { factor = 80 }
		name = mdmosjap_japan_kato.801.oA
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japan_kato.801.oA"
		mdmosjap_decrease_party_popularity_array_1_var_4 = yes
		mdmosjap_increase_party_popularity_array_0_var_2 = yes
		mdmosjap_increase_party_popularity_array_7_var_2 = yes
		add_stability = -0.02
		add_political_power = -500
		increase_mdmosjap_conrad_left_1 = yes
		set_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_KATO_REBELLION_EPILOGUE_KATO_RESIGNED
		set_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_KATO_RESIGNED

		changepm_mdmosjap_JAP_addflag_resignation = yes			#Make a flag for the resignation of P.M.
		changepm_mdmosjap_JAP_prime_minister_election = yes		#Choose the next Prime Minister
	}

	#There's no problem
	option = {
		ai_chance = { factor = 20 }
		name = mdmosjap_japan_kato.801.oB
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japan_kato.801.oB"
		mdmosjap_decrease_party_popularity_array_1_var_6 = yes
		mdmosjap_decrease_party_popularity_array_0_var_3 = yes
		mdmosjap_decrease_party_popularity_array_7_var_3 = yes

#Dissolving of the Lower House After Nonaka or Yamasaki Resigned
country_event = {
	id = mdmosjap_japan_kato.904
	title = mdmosjap_japan_kato.904.t
	desc = mdmosjap_japan_kato.904.d
	#picture = GFX_news_event_hearts_of_iron_4

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		JAP = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_YAMASAKI_RESIGNED	#Yamasaki always expelled for his scandal so it does not need to add has_country_leader.
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_NONAKA_SCANDAL
					has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_NONAKA_RESIGNED
				}
			}
			NOT = { has_country_leader = { name = "Hiromu Nonaka" } }
			OR = {
				is_in_array = { ruling_party = 0 }
				is_in_array = { ruling_party = 1 }
				is_in_array = { ruling_party = 7 }
			}
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		set_variable = { mdmosjap_JAP_var_ElectionPeriod = 23 }		#Election's Duration
	}

	option = {
		name = mdmosjap_japan.banzaidissolution
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japan_kato.904.oA"
		increase_mdmosjap_conrad_left_1 = yes
		increase_mdmosjap_conrad_right_1 = yes
		election_mdmosjap_JAP_hold_election = yes					#MUST PUT THIS SCRIPT EFFECT BELOW THE SETTING OF DURATION VARIABLE
	}
}

	}

#[HIDDEN] Result of the Crisis
country_event = {
	id = mdmosjap_japan_kato.970
	title = mdmosjap_japan_kato.970.t
	desc = mdmosjap_japan.error_hidden
	hidden = yes

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = mdmosjap_japan_kato.970.oA
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japan_kato.970.oA"
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					check_variable = { mdmosjap_var_shubun_kiki_point_L < mdmosjap_var_shubun_kiki_point_R }		#Kochikai is not stronger than Nakagawa
					check_variable = { mdmosjap_var_shubun_kiki_point_difference = 0 }								#The difference between Kochikai and Nakagawa is within 0-1
					check_variable = { mdmosjap_var_shubun_kiki_point_difference = 1 }
					AND = {
						check_variable = { mdmosjap_var_shubun_kiki_point_L > mdmosjap_var_shubun_kiki_point_R }	#Kochikai is stronger than Nakagawa but has 0 or negative
						OR = {
							check_variable = { mdmosjap_var_shubun_kiki_point_L < 0 }
							check_variable = { mdmosjap_var_shubun_kiki_point_L = 0 }
						}
					}
				}
			}
			country_event = { id = mdmosjap_japan_kato.971 days = 7 }	#Nakagawa win and no-confidence has been passed
		} else = {
			country_event = { id = mdmosjap_japan_kato.976 days = 7 }	#Kochikai win at this moment
		}
	}
}

#Kochikai Failed: The No-Confidence Has Been Passed	(2004/12/3)
country_event = {
	id = mdmosjap_japan_kato.971
	title = mdmosjap_japan_kato.971.t
	desc = mdmosjap_japan_kato.971.d
	#picture = GFX_news_event_hearts_of_iron_4

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {	#Nakagawa Faction do not need to keep their promise any longer.
		clr_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_KATO_REBELLION_EPILOGUE_KONO_ENDING_AT_LDP_DISASTER_NOW
		clr_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_KATO_REBELLION_EPILOGUE_KONO_ENDING_ABE_WILL_BE_NEXT_PM
		clr_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_KATO_REBELLION_EPILOGUE_KONO_ENDING_FUKUDA_WILL_BE_NEXT_PM
	}

	#Kono/Kato quits his job
	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
		}
		name = mdmosjap_japan_kato.971.oA
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japan_kato.971.oA"
		add_political_power = -200
		add_stability = -0.01
		mdmosjap_decrease_party_popularity_array_1_var_10 = yes
		mdmosjap_increase_party_popularity_array_7_var_10 = yes
		increase_mdmosjap_conrad_left_1 = yes
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_leader = { name = "Yohei Kono" } }
			set_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_YOHEI_KONO_RESIGNED
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_leader = { name = "Koichi Kato" } }
			set_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_KATO_RESIGNED
		}

	#	set_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_NO_ELECTION_REGIME_CHANGE
		changepm_mdmosjap_JAP_addflag_resignation = yes			#Make a flag for the resignation of P.M.
		changepm_mdmosjap_JAP_summon_shinzo_abe = yes			#Abe, I choose you
		country_event = { id = mdmosjap_japan_kato.972 days = 273 }	#
	}

	#Dissolution of the Lower House
	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 75
		}
		name = mdmosjap_japan_kato.971.oB
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japan_kato.971.oB"
		add_stability = -0.03
		mdmosjap_decrease_party_popularity_array_1_var_5 = yes
		mdmosjap_increase_party_popularity_array_7_var_5 = yes
		increase_mdmosjap_conrad_left_1 = yes
		set_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_MORI_RESIGNED

	#	set_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_NO_ELECTION_REGIME_CHANGE
		changepm_mdmosjap_JAP_addflag_resignation = yes			#Make a flag for the resignation of P.M.
		changepm_mdmosjap_JAP_summon_shinzo_abe = yes			#Abe, I choose you
		country_event = mdmosjap_japan_kato.972
	}
}

		clr_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_KATO_REBELLION_EPILOGUE_KONO_ENDING_AT_LDP_DISASTER_NOW
	}

		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japan_kato.984.oA"
		if = {
			limit = { is_in_array = { gov_coalition_array = 0 } }
			remove_from_array = { gov_coalition_array = 0 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { is_in_array = { gov_coalition_array = 1 } }
			remove_from_array = { gov_coalition_array = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { is_in_array = { gov_coalition_array = 7 } }
			remove_from_array = { gov_coalition_array = 7 }
		}
		add_stability = -0.10
		#set_political_power = -2000
		set_political_power = 0
		mdmosjap_decrease_party_popularity_array_0_var_5 = yes
		mdmosjap_decrease_party_popularity_array_1_var_5 = yes
		mdmosjap_decrease_party_popularity_array_7_var_5 = yes
		increase_mdmosjap_conrad_right_2 = yes
		news_event = { id = mdmosjap_japannews_kato.984 days = 1 }
		country_event = { id = mdmosjap_japan_kato.985 days = 168 }
		set_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_LDP_COLLAPSE_CHANGE_PARTY_NAME
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = mdmosjap_japan_kato.991
	title = mdmosjap_japan_kato.991.t
	desc = mdmosjap_japan_kato.991.d
	#picture = GFX_news_event_hearts_of_iron_4

#	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		is_in_array = { ruling_party = 1 }
		NOT = { is_in_array = { gov_coalition_array = 2 } }
		has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_KATO_REBELLION_EPILOGUE_KONO_ENDING_COALITION_WITH_DPJ
		OR = {	#After the end of the crisis in any paths
			has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_KATO_REBELLION_SHINZO_ABE_HAS_BEEN_TRANQUILISED
			has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_LDP_COLLAPSE_CHANGE_PARTY_NAME		#Use this flag for the time lag
		}
		NOT = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_LDP_DPJ_COALITION_YES }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_LDP_DPJ_COALITION_NO }	#If you choose no, then you won't get the coalition ever
		NOT = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_RIKKEN }						#If DPJ collapsed, then you won't get the coalition ever
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = { days = 3 }

	#Yes
	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 99
		}
		name = mdmosjap_japan_kato.991.oA
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japan_kato.991.oA"
		add_political_power = 300
		add_popularity = { ideology = communism popularity = 0.10 }
		add_to_array = { gov_coalition_array = 2 }
		mdmosjap_increase_party_popularity_array_1_var_8 = yes
		mdmosjap_increase_party_popularity_array_2_var_4 = yes
		hidden_effect = { remove_mission = coalition_countdown }
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_LDP_DPJ_COALITION_YES }
			set_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_LDP_DPJ_COALITION_YES
		}
	}

	#No
	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		name = mdmosjap_japan_kato.991.oB
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japan_kato.991.oB"
		add_political_power = -500
		add_popularity = { ideology = democratic popularity = 0.10 }
		mdmosjap_decrease_party_popularity_array_1_var_5 = yes
		mdmosjap_increase_party_popularity_array_2_var_5 = yes
		increase_mdmosjap_conrad_left_5 = yes
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_LDP_DPJ_COALITION_NO }
			set_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_LDP_DPJ_COALITION_NO
		}
	}
}

				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = {

			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				has_stability < 0.25
				factor = 0.5
			}
			modifier = {
				has_stability < 0.10
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		name = mdmosjap_japan.1521203.oC
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japan.1521203.oC"
		add_stability = -0.01
		add_political_power = -80
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = police_02 }
			swap_ideas = { remove_idea = police_02 add_idea = police_03 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = police_01 }
			swap_ideas = { remove_idea = police_01 add_idea = police_03 }
		}
		increase_mdmosjap_conrad_right_2 = yes
		hidden_effect = {

				}
				25 = {
					ROOT = { country_event = { id = mdmosjap_japan.1521205 days = 7 } }
				}
			}
		}
	}

	#We need a brand new solution...

			factor = 25
		}

		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japan.1521203.oD"

#Operation Amaterasu is a Success!
country_event = {
	id = mdmosjap_japan.1541303
	title = mdmosjap_japan.1541303.t
	desc = mdmosjap_japan.1541303.d
	#picture = GFX_news_event_hearts_of_iron_4

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = mdmosjap_japan.1541303.oA
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japan.1541303.oA"
		if = {
			limit = { trigger_mdmosjap_has_the_leftwing_government = yes }
			mdmosjap_increase_ruling_party_popularity_10 = yes
			increase_mdmosjap_conrad_right_4 = yes
			add_war_support = 0.05
		} else_if = {
			limit = { trigger_mdmosjap_has_the_rightwing_government = yes }
			mdmosjap_increase_ruling_party_popularity_10 = yes
			increase_mdmosjap_conrad_left_4 = yes
			add_war_support = 0.05
		} else_if = {
			limit = { trigger_mdmosjap_has_the_islamist_government = yes }
			increase_mdmosjap_conrad_left_4 = yes
			increase_mdmosjap_conrad_right_4 = yes
		} else = {
			mdmosjap_decrease_ruling_party_popularity_10 = yes
			increase_mdmosjap_conrad_left_4 = yes
			increase_mdmosjap_conrad_right_4 = yes
		}
		add_named_threat = { threat = 5.0 name = MDMOSJAP_JAP_operation_amaterasu }
	}
}

#Constitutional Contradiction
country_event = {
	id = mdmosjap_japan.1511801
	title = mdmosjap_japan.1511801.t
	desc = mdmosjap_japan.1511801.d
	#picture = GFX_news_event_hearts_of_iron_4

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
	}

	option = {
		name = mdmosjap_japan.1511801.oA
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japan.1511801.oA"
		swap_ideas = { remove_idea = JAP_holy_article_9 add_idea = JAP_holy_article_9contradicted1 }
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = intervention_isolation }
			swap_ideas = { remove_idea = intervention_isolation add_idea = intervention_regional_interventionism }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = intervention_local_security }
			swap_ideas = { remove_idea = intervention_local_security add_idea = intervention_regional_interventionism }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = intervention_limited_interventionism }
			swap_ideas = { remove_idea = intervention_limited_interventionism add_idea = intervention_regional_interventionism }
		}
		increase_mdmosjap_concon_left_3 = yes
		increase_mdmosjap_conrad_left_3 = yes
	}
}

					JAP = {

							is_in_array = { ruling_party = 22 }
							is_in_array = { ruling_party = 23 }

					}
				}

			}
		}
		name = mdmosjap_japan.1631413.oA
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japan.1631413.oA"
		ROOT = { set_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_JAP_JOIN_P5_SUPPORTING }
		add_to_variable = { mdmosjap_un_p5vote_japjoinsp5_var = 1 }

		if = {

		}
	}

	#We refuse it.
	option = {

			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				JAP = {
					NOT = { has_government = fascism }
					NOT = { has_government = nationalist }

					NOT = { is_in_array = { ruling_party = 1 } }
					NOT = { is_in_array = { ruling_party = 4 } }
					NOT = { is_in_array = { ruling_party = 5 } }
					NOT = { is_in_array = { ruling_party = 6 } }
					NOT = { is_in_array = { ruling_party = 7 } }
					NOT = { is_in_array = { ruling_party = 13 } }
					NOT = { is_in_array = { ruling_party = 19 } }
					NOT = { is_in_array = { ruling_party = 20 } }
					NOT = { is_in_array = { ruling_party = 21 } }
					NOT = { is_in_array = { ruling_party = 22 } }
					NOT = { is_in_array = { ruling_party = 23 } }
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				JAP = {
					OR = {
						has_government = fascism
						has_government = nationalist
						is_in_array = { ruling_party = 0 }
						is_in_array = { ruling_party = 1 }
						is_in_array = { ruling_party = 4 }
						is_in_array = { ruling_party = 5 }
						is_in_array = { ruling_party = 6 }
						is_in_array = { ruling_party = 7 }
						is_in_array = { ruling_party = 13 }
						is_in_array = { ruling_party = 19 }
						is_in_array = { ruling_party = 20 }
						is_in_array = { ruling_party = 21 }
						is_in_array = { ruling_party = 22 }
						is_in_array = { ruling_party = 23 }
					}
				}
				factor = 0.2
			}
		}
		name = mdmosjap_japan.1631413.oB
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japan.1631413.oB"

		name = mdmosjap_japan.1631414.oD
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japan.1631414.oD"
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_other_country = {
					has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_JAP_JOIN_P5_REFUSING
				}
			}
			every_other_country = {
				limit = { has_idea = p5_member }
				country_event = mdmosjap_japan.1631417
			}
		} else = {
			every_other_country = {
				limit = { has_idea = p5_member }
				country_event = mdmosjap_japan.1631415
			}
		}
	}
}

					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 23 }
				}
				factor = 0
			}

		name = mdmosjap_japan.1561701.oA
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japan.1561701.oA"
		JAP = { country_event = mdmosjap_japan.1561702 }
	}

	#We refuse
	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				OR = {
					AND = {

						JAP = { has_government = fascism }
					}
					AND = {
						ROOT = { has_government = neutrality }
						JAP = { has_government = neutrality }
					}

			}
			modifier = {

					JAP = { has_government = democratic }
				}
				AND = {
					ROOT = { has_government = communism }
					JAP = { has_government = communism }
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		name = mdmosjap_japan.1561701.oB

#China Accepted Our Application!
country_event = {
	id = mdmosjap_japan.1561702
	title = mdmosjap_japan.1561702.t
	desc = mdmosjap_japan.1561702.d
	#picture = GFX_news_event_hearts_of_iron_4

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = mdmosjap_japan.generic_great
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japan.1561702.oA"
		FROM = { add_to_faction = JAP }
		every_other_country = {
			limit = { is_in_faction_with = CHI }
			add_ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "JAP" value = 400 }
			add_ai_strategy = { type = befriend id = "JAP" value = 400 }
			add_ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "JAP" value = -400 }
		}
		JAP = {
			add_ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "CHI" value = 400 }
			add_ai_strategy = { type = befriend id = "CHI" value = 400 }
			add_ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "CHI" value = -400 }
		}
		news_event = { id = mdmosjap_japannews.1561702 days = 1 }
		if = {		#Leave from NATO
			limit = {
				AND = {
					NOT = {
						AND = {
							JAP = { has_idea = NATO_member }
							CHI = { has_idea = NATO_member }
						}
					}
					CHI = {
						OR = {
							has_idea = NATO_member
							has_idea = Major_Non_NATO_Ally
						}
					}
				}
			}
			CHI = { country_event = { id = mdmosjap_japan.1561721 days = 2 } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					NOT = {
						AND = {
							JAP = { has_idea = NATO_member }
							CHI = { has_idea = NATO_member }
						}
					}
					JAP = {
						OR = {
							has_idea = NATO_member
							has_idea = Major_Non_NATO_Ally
						}
					}
				}
			}
			JAP = { country_event = { id = mdmosjap_japan.1561721 days = 2 } }
		}
	}
}

	major = yes

	#ROOT country
	option = {
		trigger = {
			tag = ROOT
		}
		name = mdmosjap_japannews.1561721.oA
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japannews.1561721.oA"
	}

	#NATO country
	option = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = { tag = ROOT }
			any_country = {
				OR = {
					has_idea = NATO_member
					has_idea = Major_Non_NATO_Ally
				}
			}
		}
		name = mdmosjap_japannews.1561721.oB
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japannews.1561721.oB"
	}

	#The others
	option = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = { tag = ROOT }
			any_country = {
				AND = {
					NOT = { has_idea = NATO_member }
					NOT = { has_idea = Major_Non_NATO_Ally }
				}
			}
		}
		name = mdmosjap_japannews.1561721.oC
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japannews.1561721.oC"
	}

country_event = {
	id = mdmosjap_japan.1581701
	title = mdmosjap_japan.1581701.t
	desc = mdmosjap_japan.1581701.d
	#picture = GFX_news_event_hearts_of_iron_4

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	#We accept
	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				OR = {
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 13 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 21 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 23 }
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		name = mdmosjap_japan.1581701.oA
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japan.1581701.oA"
		JAP = { country_event = mdmosjap_japan.1581702 }
	}

	#We refuse
	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						ROOT = { has_government = fascism }
						JAP = { has_government = fascism }
					}
					AND = {
						ROOT = { has_government = neutrality }
						JAP = { has_government = neutrality }
					}
					AND = {
						ROOT = { has_government = nationalist }
						JAP = { has_government = nationalist }
					}
				}
				add = 100
			}
			modifier = {
				AND = {
					ROOT = { has_government = democratic }
					JAP = { has_government = democratic }
				}
				AND = {
					ROOT = { has_government = communism }
					JAP = { has_government = communism }
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		name = mdmosjap_japan.1581701.oB
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japan.1581701.oB"
		JAP = { country_event = mdmosjap_japan.1581703 }
	}
}

#Russia Accepted Our Application!
country_event = {
	id = mdmosjap_japan.1581702
	title = mdmosjap_japan.1581702.t
	desc = mdmosjap_japan.1581702.d
	#picture = GFX_news_event_hearts_of_iron_4

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = mdmosjap_japan.generic_great
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japan.1581702.oA"
		FROM = { add_to_faction = JAP }
		JAP = { add_to_tech_sharing_group = CSTO_Tech_Share }
		every_other_country = {
			limit = { is_in_faction_with = SOV }
			add_ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "JAP" value = 400 }
			add_ai_strategy = { type = befriend id = "JAP" value = 400 }
			add_ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "JAP" value = -400 }
		}
		JAP = {
			add_ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "SOV" value = 400 }
			add_ai_strategy = { type = befriend id = "SOV" value = 400 }
			add_ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "SOV" value = -400 }
		}
		news_event = { id = mdmosjap_japannews.1581702 days = 1 }
		if = {		#Leave from NATO
			limit = {
				AND = {
					NOT = {
						AND = {
							JAP = { has_idea = NATO_member }
							SOV = { has_idea = NATO_member }
						}
					}
					SOV = {
						OR = {
							has_idea = NATO_member
							has_idea = Major_Non_NATO_Ally
						}
					}
				}
			}
			SOV = { country_event = { id = mdmosjap_japan.1561721 days = 2 } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					NOT = {
						AND = {
							JAP = { has_idea = NATO_member }
							SOV = { has_idea = NATO_member }
						}
					}
					JAP = {
						OR = {
							has_idea = NATO_member
							has_idea = Major_Non_NATO_Ally
						}
					}
				}
			}
			JAP = { country_event = { id = mdmosjap_japan.1561721 days = 2 } }
		}
	}
}

#Japan Suggests to Join Their Alliance
country_event = {
	id = mdmosjap_japan.1621711
	title = mdmosjap_japan.1621711.t
	desc = mdmosjap_japan.1621711.d
	#picture = GFX_news_event_hearts_of_iron_4

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	#We accept
	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				OR = {
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 13 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 21 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 23 }
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		name = mdmosjap_japan.1621711.oA
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japan.1621711.oA"
		JAP = { country_event = mdmosjap_japan.1621712 }
	}

	#We refuse
	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						USA = { has_government = communism }
						JAP = { has_government = communism }
					}
					AND = {
						USA = { has_government = fascism }
						JAP = { has_government = fascism }
					}
					AND = {
						USA = { has_government = neutrality }
						JAP = { has_government = neutrality }
					}
					AND = {
						USA = { has_government = nationalist }
						JAP = { has_government = nationalist }
					}
				}
				add = 100
			}
			modifier = {
				AND = {
					USA = { has_government = democratic }
					JAP = { has_government = democratic }
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		name = mdmosjap_japan.1621711.oB
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japan.1621711.oB"
		JAP = { country_event = mdmosjap_japan.1621713 }
	}
}

#USA Accepted Our Suggestion!
country_event = {
	id = mdmosjap_japan.1621712
	title = mdmosjap_japan.1621712.t
	desc = mdmosjap_japan.1621712.d
	#picture = GFX_news_event_hearts_of_iron_4

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = mdmosjap_japan.generic_great
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japan.1621712.oA"
		JAP = {
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { is_in_faction = yes } }
				create_faction = mdmosjap_faction_JAP_pacific_treaty_association
			}
			add_to_faction = FROM
		}
		every_other_country = {
			limit = { is_in_faction_with = USA }
			add_ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "JAP" value = 400 }
			add_ai_strategy = { type = befriend id = "JAP" value = 400 }
			add_ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "JAP" value = -400 }
		}
		JAP = {
			add_ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "USA" value = 400 }
			add_ai_strategy = { type = befriend id = "USA" value = 400 }
			add_ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "USA" value = -400 }
		}
		news_event = { id = mdmosjap_japannews.1621712 days = 1 }
		if = {		#Leave from NATO
			limit = {
				AND = {
					NOT = {
						AND = {
							JAP = { has_idea = NATO_member }
							USA = { has_idea = NATO_member }
						}
					}
					USA = {
						OR = {
							has_idea = NATO_member
							has_idea = Major_Non_NATO_Ally
						}
					}
				}
			}
			USA = { country_event = { id = mdmosjap_japan.1561721 days = 2 } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					NOT = {
						AND = {
							JAP = { has_idea = NATO_member }
							USA = { has_idea = NATO_member }
						}
					}
					JAP = {
						OR = {
							has_idea = NATO_member
							has_idea = Major_Non_NATO_Ally
						}
					}
				}
			}
			JAP = { country_event = { id = mdmosjap_japan.1561721 days = 2 } }
		}
	}
}

	desc = mdmosjap_japan.1641701.d
	#picture = GFX_news_event_hearts_of_iron_4

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	#We accept
	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				OR = {
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 13 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 21 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 23 }
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		name = mdmosjap_japan.1641701.oA
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japan.1641701.oA"
		JAP = { country_event = mdmosjap_japan.1641702 }
	}

	#We refuse
	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						ENG = { has_government = communism }
						JAP = { has_government = communism }
					}
					AND = {
						ENG = { has_government = fascism }
						JAP = { has_government = fascism }

				}
				add = 100
			}
			modifier = {
				AND = {
					ENG = { has_government = democratic }
					JAP = { has_government = democratic }
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		name = mdmosjap_japan.1641701.oB

country_event = {
	id = mdmosjap_japan.1641702
	title = mdmosjap_japan.1641702.t
	desc = mdmosjap_japan.1641702.d
	#picture = GFX_news_event_hearts_of_iron_4

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = mdmosjap_japan.generic_great
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japan.1641702.oA"
		FROM = { add_to_faction = JAP }
		every_other_country = {
			limit = { is_in_faction_with = ENG }
			add_ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "JAP" value = 400 }
			add_ai_strategy = { type = befriend id = "JAP" value = 400 }
			add_ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "JAP" value = -400 }
		}
		JAP = {
			add_ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "ENG" value = 400 }
			add_ai_strategy = { type = befriend id = "ENG" value = 400 }
			add_ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "ENG" value = -400 }
		}
		news_event = { id = mdmosjap_japannews.1641702 days = 1 }
		if = {		#Leave from NATO
			limit = {
				AND = {
					NOT = {
						AND = {
							JAP = { has_idea = NATO_member }
							ENG = { has_idea = NATO_member }
						}
					}
					ENG = {
						OR = {
							has_idea = NATO_member
							has_idea = Major_Non_NATO_Ally
						}
					}
				}
			}
			ENG = { country_event = { id = mdmosjap_japan.1561721 days = 2 } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					NOT = {
						AND = {
							JAP = { has_idea = NATO_member }
							ENG = { has_idea = NATO_member }
						}
					}
					JAP = {
						OR = {
							has_idea = NATO_member
							has_idea = Major_Non_NATO_Ally
						}
					}
				}
			}
			JAP = { country_event = { id = mdmosjap_japan.1561721 days = 2 } }
		}
	}
}

#//////// The Co-Prosperity Strikes Back /////////
#Japan Founds the Original Alliance - Again
news_event = {
	id = mdmosjap_japannews.1661702
	title = mdmosjap_japannews.1661702.t
	desc = mdmosjap_japannews.1661702.d
	#picture = GFX_news_event_hearts_of_iron_4

	is_triggered_only = yes

	major = yes

	#Japan
	option = {
		trigger = {
			tag = JAP
		}
		name = mdmosjap_japannews.1661702.oA
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japannews.1661702.oA"
	}

	#Asia
	option = {
		trigger = {
			AND = {
				capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia }
				capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america }
				capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia }
				NOT = { tag = JAP }
			}
		}
		name = mdmosjap_japannews.1661702.oB
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japannews.1661702.oB"
	}

	#The others
	option = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe }
				capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east }
				capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa }
				capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america }
			}
		}
		name = mdmosjap_japannews.1661702.oC
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japannews.1661702.oC"
	}
}

news_event = {
	id = mdmosjap_japannews.1611801
	title = mdmosjap_japannews.1611801.t
	desc = mdmosjap_japannews.1611801.d
	picture = GFX_JAP_nationalism2

	is_triggered_only = yes

	major = yes

	#Japan
	option = {
		trigger = {
			tag = JAP
		}
		name = mdmosjap_japannews.1611801.oA
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japannews.1611801.oA"
	}

	#Asia, Oceania, USA and Russia
	option = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia }
					NOT = { tag = JAP }
				}
				capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia }
				tag = USA
				tag = SOV
			}
		}
		name = mdmosjap_japannews.1611801.oB
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japannews.1611801.oB"
	}

	#The others
	option = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe }
					NOT = { tag = SOV }
				}
				capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east }
				capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa }
				AND = {
					capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america }
					NOT = { tag = USA }
				}
				capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america }
			}
		}
		name = mdmosjap_japannews.1611801.oC
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japannews.1611801.oC"
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = mdmosjap_japan.1732001
	title = mdmosjap_japan.1732001.t
	desc = mdmosjap_japan.1732001.d
	#picture = GFX_news_event_hearts_of_iron_4

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	#Yes
	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				AND = {
					NKO = {
						is_in_faction = yes
						NOT = { is_in_faction_with = FROM }
					}
					FROM = {
						is_in_faction = yes
						NOT = { is_in_faction_with = NKO }
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		name = mdmosjap_japan.1732001.oA
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japan.1732001.oA"
		FROM = { country_event = { id = mdmosjap_japan.1732002 days = 7 } }
	}

	#No
	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				AND = {
					NKO = {
						is_in_faction = yes
						NOT = { is_in_faction_with = FROM }
					}
					FROM = {
						is_in_faction = yes
						NOT = { is_in_faction_with = NKO }
					}
				}
				add = 100
			}
		}
		name = mdmosjap_japan.1732001.oB
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japan.1732001.oB"
		FROM = { country_event = { id = mdmosjap_japan.1732003 days = 7 } }
	}

	#		}
	#	}

		ROOT = {
			give_guarantee = FROM
			diplomatic_relation = { country = FROM relation = guarantee active = yes }
		}

		NKO = {
			add_ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "JAP" value = 200 }
			add_ai_strategy = { type = prepare_for_war id = "KOR" value = 1000 }
		}
		KOR = {
			add_ai_strategy = { type = force_build_armies value = 100 }
			add_ai_strategy = { type = prepare_for_war id = "NKO" value = 1000 }
			add_ai_strategy = { type = prepare_for_war id = "JAP" value = 1000 }
		}
		JAP = {
			add_ai_strategy = { type = protect id = "NKO" value = 200 }
		}
		add_war_support = 0.03
		news_event = mdmosjap_japannews.1732002
		set_global_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_IMPENDING_JAPANESE_INTERVENTION_IN_KOREAS
	}
}

		}
		NKO = {
			exists = yes
			NOT = { is_in_faction = yes }
			NOT = { is_subject = yes }
			NOT = { is_puppet = yes }
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = { days = 7 }

	#Yes
	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
		name = mdmosjap_japan.1752000.oA
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japan.1752000.oA"
		NKO = { country_event = { id = mdmosjap_japan.1752001 days = 1 } }

#Retrocession of the Korean Peninsula Occupation Zone
country_event = {
	id = mdmosjap_japan.1732200
	title = mdmosjap_japan.1732200.t
	desc = mdmosjap_japan.1732200.d
	#picture = GFX_news_event_hearts_of_iron_4

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	#Return the land to South Korea
	option = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				NOT = { country_exists = NKO }
				NKO = {
					OR = {
						is_puppet_of = ROOT
						is_subject_of = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				has_completed_focus = JAP_force_promise
				factor = 0.5
			}
			modifier = {
				has_completed_focus = JAP_anti_korea_doctrine
				factor = 0.4
			}
		}
		name = mdmosjap_japan.1732200.oA
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japan.1732200.oA"
		if = {		#Dismantle Puppetised North Korean Government
			limit = {
				NKO = {
					OR = {
						is_puppet_of = ROOT
						is_subject_of = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
			NKO = { country_event = { id = mdmosjap_japan.200308 } }
		}
		if = {		#Give Korean States to South Korea
			limit = {
				ROOT = { controls_state = 601 }
				NOT = { KOR = { controls_state = 601 } }
			}
			KOR = { transfer_state = 601 }
			ROOT = {
				remove_state_core = 601
				remove_state_claim = 601
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ROOT = { controls_state = 602 }
				NOT = { KOR = { controls_state = 602 } }
			}
			KOR = { transfer_state = 602 }
			ROOT = {
				remove_state_core = 602
				remove_state_claim = 602
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ROOT = { controls_state = 603 }
				NOT = { KOR = { controls_state = 603 } }
			}
			KOR = { transfer_state = 603 }
			ROOT = {
				remove_state_core = 603
				remove_state_claim = 603
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ROOT = { controls_state = 604 }
				NOT = { KOR = { controls_state = 604 } }
			}
			KOR = { transfer_state = 604 }
			ROOT = {
				remove_state_core = 604
				remove_state_claim = 604
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ROOT = { controls_state = 605 }
				NOT = { KOR = { controls_state = 605 } }
			}
			KOR = { transfer_state = 605 }
			ROOT = {
				remove_state_core = 605
				remove_state_claim = 605
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ROOT = { controls_state = 606 }
				NOT = { KOR = { controls_state = 606 } }
			}
			KOR = { transfer_state = 606 }
			ROOT = {
				remove_state_core = 606
				remove_state_claim = 606
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ROOT = { controls_state = 607 }
				NOT = { KOR = { controls_state = 607 } }
			}
			KOR = { transfer_state = 607 }
			ROOT = {
				remove_state_core = 607
				remove_state_claim = 607
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ROOT = { controls_state = 608 }
				NOT = { KOR = { controls_state = 608 } }
			}
			KOR = { transfer_state = 608 }
			ROOT = {
				remove_state_core = 608
				remove_state_claim = 608
			}
		}
		every_state = {		#Remove North Korean Claims
			limit = {
				is_claimed_by = NKO
				is_owned_by = NKO
			}
			remove_core_of = NKO
			remove_claim_by = NKO
		}

		KOR = { country_event = mdmosjap_japannews.1732202 }
	}

	#Return the land to North Korea
	option = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				NOT = { country_exists = KOR }
				KOR = {
					OR = {
						is_puppet_of = ROOT
						is_subject_of = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
		}
		name = mdmosjap_japan.1732200.oB
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japan.1732200.oB"
		if = {		#Dismantle Puppetised South Korean Government
			limit = {
				KOR = {
					OR = {
						is_puppet_of = ROOT
						is_subject_of = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
			KOR = { country_event = { id = mdmosjap_japan.200308 } }
		}
		if = {		#Give Korean States to North Korea
			limit = {

			}
			NKO = { transfer_state = 601 }
			ROOT = {
				remove_state_core = 601

			}
		}
		if = {

				NOT = { NKO = { controls_state = 602 } }
			}
			NKO = { transfer_state = 602 }
			ROOT = {
				remove_state_core = 602
				remove_state_claim = 602
			}
		}

country_event = {
	id = mdmosjap_japan.1752203
	title = mdmosjap_japan.1752203.t
	desc = mdmosjap_japan.1752203.d
	#picture = GFX_news_event_hearts_of_iron_4

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = mdmosjap_japan.1752203.oA
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japan.1752203.oA"
		add_stability = -0.02
		add_war_support = 0.02
		increase_mdmosjap_conrad_left_3 = yes
		increase_mdmosjap_conrad_right_1 = yes
		remove_opinion_modifier = { target = KOR modifier = mdmosjap_opinion_KOR_JAP_refugee_agreement_approved }
		remove_opinion_modifier = { target = KOR modifier = mdmosjap_opinion_JAP_KOR_alliance_by_nf }
		set_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_JAPKOR_REFUGEE_AGREEMENT_REVOKED
		KOR = { country_event = mdmosjap_japan.1752204 }

		JAP = {
			add_ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "KOR" value = -400 }
			add_ai_strategy = { type = befriend id = "KOR" value = -1000 }
			add_ai_strategy = { type = prepare_for_war id = "KOR" value = 1000 }
		}
	}
}

		add_political_power = 100
		add_stability = -0.05

					OR = {
						is_puppet_of = ROOT

					}
				}
			}
			KOR = { country_event = mdmosjap_japan.200308 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NKO = {
					OR = {
						is_puppet_of = ROOT
						is_subject_of = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
			NKO = { country_event = mdmosjap_japan.200308 }
		}
	}

country_event = {
	id = mdmosjap_japan.1772211
	title = mdmosjap_japan.1772211.t
	desc = mdmosjap_japan.1772211.d
	#picture = GFX_news_event_hearts_of_iron_4

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = mdmosjap_japan.1772211.oA
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japan.1772211.oA"
		if = {
			limit = {
				NKO = {
					OR = {
						is_puppet_of = FROM
						is_subject_of = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			every_state = {
				limit = {
					is_core_of = ROOT
				}
				KOJ = {
					add_state_core = PREV
				}
				ROOT = {

		}
		if = {
			limit = {

					OR = {
						is_puppet_of = FROM
						is_subject_of = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			every_state = {
				limit = {
					is_core_of = ROOT
				}
				KOJ = {
					add_state_core = PREV
				}
				ROOT = {

			}

				}
			}

		}
		FROM = { puppet = KOJ }

country_event = {
	id = mdmosjap_japan.91650102
	title = mdmosjap_japan.91650102.t
	desc = mdmosjap_japan.91650102.d
	#picture = GFX_news_event_hearts_of_iron_4

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = mdmosjap_japan.91650102.oA
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japan.91650102.oA"
		add_political_power = 100
		mdmosjap_increase_ruling_party_popularity_5 = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 2 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 3 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 4 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 5 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 16 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 17 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 18 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 19 }
				}
			}
			decrease_mdmosjap_conrad_left_1 = yes
			increase_mdmosjap_conrad_right_5 = yes

		} else_if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 6 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 7 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 20 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 21 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 22 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 23 }
				}
			}
			increase_mdmosjap_conrad_left_5 = yes
			decrease_mdmosjap_conrad_right_1 = yes
		} else = {
			decrease_mdmosjap_conrad_left_3 = yes
			decrease_mdmosjap_conrad_right_3 = yes
		}
		increase_mdmosjap_concon_right_2 = yes
	}
}

		news_event = { id = mdmosjap_japannews.1620201 days = 1 }
	}

	#Not LDP, JIP and Nationalists
	option = {
		trigger = {

				NOT = { is_in_array = { ruling_party = 0 } }
				NOT = { is_in_array = { ruling_party = 1 } }
				NOT = { is_in_array = { ruling_party = 6 } }
				NOT = { is_in_array = { ruling_party = 7 } }

			}
		}
		name = mdmosjap_japan.1620201.oB
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japan.1620201.oB"
		USA = { country_event = { id = mdmosjap_japan.1620202 hours = 1 } }
		KOR = { country_event = { id = mdmosjap_japan.1620203 hours = 1 } }
		TAI = { country_event = { id = mdmosjap_japan.1620203 hours = 1 } }
		CHI = { country_event = { id = mdmosjap_japan.1620204 hours = 1 } }
		NKO = { country_event = { id = mdmosjap_japan.1620204 hours = 1 } }
		SOV = { country_event = { id = mdmosjap_japan.1620204 hours = 1 } }
		news_event = { id = mdmosjap_japannews.1620201 days = 1 }
		#"Loopy" hooting

		if = {
			limit = { is_in_array = { gov_coalition_array = 3 } }

		}

		}

				NOT = { tag = TAI }

	}

#Henoko Negotiation: Japan's Plan
country_event = {
	id = mdmosjap_japan.1640206
	title = mdmosjap_japan.1640206.t
	desc = mdmosjap_japan.1640206.d
	#picture = GFX_news_event_hearts_of_iron_4

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	#We Agree This Plan
	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { var = mdmosjap_JAP_var_HenokoNegotiation value = 6 compare = less_than }
				factor = 0
			}

country_event = {
	id = mdmosjap_japan.1640207
	title = mdmosjap_japan.1640207.t
	desc = mdmosjap_japan.1640207.d
	#picture = GFX_news_event_hearts_of_iron_4

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = mdmosjap_japan.generic_great
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japan.1640207.oA"
		#By the Withdrawal Proposal
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_HENOKO_NEGOTIATION_SMALL_WITHDRAWAL }
			827 = { remove_building = { type = air_base level = mdmosjap_JAP_var_HenokoNegotiation_moving } }
			618 = { add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_HENOKO_NEGOTIATION_MEDIUM_WITHDRAWAL }
			827 = { remove_building = { type = air_base level = mdmosjap_JAP_var_HenokoNegotiation_moving } }
			618 = { add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 2 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_HENOKO_NEGOTIATION_LARGE_WITHDRAWAL }
			827 = { remove_building = { type = air_base level = mdmosjap_JAP_var_HenokoNegotiation_moving } }
			618 = { add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 3 }
		}

		#By the Allotment Proposal
		if = {
			if = {
				limit = { check_variable = { mdmosjap_JAP_var_HenokoNegotiation_debt > 0 } }
				add_to_variable = { debt = mdmosjap_JAP_var_HenokoNegotiation_debt }
				custom_effect_tooltip = MDMOSJAP_add_debt_HenokoNegotiation_TT
				set_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EXTERNAL_DEBT_CHANGE
			}
			if = {
				limit = { check_variable = { mdmosjap_JAP_var_HenokoNegotiation_debt = 0 } }
				custom_effect_tooltip = MDMOSJAP_add_debt_HenokoNegotiation_zero_TT
			}
			clear_variable = mdmosjap_JAP_var_HenokoNegotiation_debt
		}

		#By the Replace Location
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_HENOKO_NEGOTIATION_MOVE_TO_TOHOKU }
			divide_variable = { mdmosjap_JAP_var_HenokoNegotiation_moving = 2 }
			617 = { add_building_construction = { type = air_base level = mdmosjap_JAP_var_HenokoNegotiation_moving instant_build = yes } }
			616 = { add_building_construction = { type = air_base level = mdmosjap_JAP_var_HenokoNegotiation_moving instant_build = yes } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_HENOKO_NEGOTIATION_MOVE_TO_CHUBU }
			613 = { add_building_construction = { type = air_base level = mdmosjap_JAP_var_HenokoNegotiation_moving instant_build = yes } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_HENOKO_NEGOTIATION_MOVE_TO_SHIKOKU }
			divide_variable = { mdmosjap_JAP_var_HenokoNegotiation_moving = 2 }
			611 = { add_building_construction = { type = air_base level = mdmosjap_JAP_var_HenokoNegotiation_moving instant_build = yes } }
			610 = { add_building_construction = { type = air_base level = mdmosjap_JAP_var_HenokoNegotiation_moving instant_build = yes } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_HENOKO_NEGOTIATION_MOVE_TO_IWOJIMA }
			divide_variable = { mdmosjap_JAP_var_HenokoNegotiation_moving = 2 }
			621 = { add_building_construction = { type = air_base level = mdmosjap_JAP_var_HenokoNegotiation_moving instant_build = yes } }
			620 = { add_building_construction = { type = air_base level = mdmosjap_JAP_var_HenokoNegotiation_moving instant_build = yes } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_HENOKO_NEGOTIATION_MOVE_AND_TRANSFER }
			divide_variable = { mdmosjap_JAP_var_HenokoNegotiation_moving = 2 }
			621 = { add_building_construction = { type = air_base level = mdmosjap_JAP_var_HenokoNegotiation_moving instant_build = yes } }
			620 = { add_building_construction = { type = air_base level = mdmosjap_JAP_var_HenokoNegotiation_moving instant_build = yes } }
			JAP = { country_event = { id = mdmosjap_japan.1640209 days = 1 } }	#Transfer Event
		}
		clear_variable = mdmosjap_JAP_var_HenokoNegotiation
		clear_variable = mdmosjap_JAP_var_HenokoNegotiation_moving
		ROOT = { add_opinion_modifier = { target = USA modifier = recent_actions_very_positive } }
		add_country_leader_trait = honest
		set_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_HENOKO_NEGOTIATION_AGREED
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = mdmosjap_japan.1660201
	title = mdmosjap_japan.1660201.t
	desc = mdmosjap_japan.1660201.d
	#picture = GFX_news_event_hearts_of_iron_4

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	#Promise Japan's Demand
	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 90
			modifier = {
				FROM = {
					OR = {
						is_in_array = { ruling_party = 4 }
						is_in_array = { ruling_party = 5 }
						is_in_array = { ruling_party = 18 }
						is_in_array = { ruling_party = 19 }
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		name = mdmosjap_japan.1660201.oA
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japan.1660201.oA"
		add_political_power = -100
		add_ideas = JAP_USA_base_removal_in_okinawa1
		827 = { set_demilitarized_zone = yes }
		FROM = { country_event = { id = mdmosjap_japan.1660202 days = 1 } }
		effect_tooltip = { JAP = { add_opinion_modifier = { target = USA modifier = mdmosjap_opinion_USA_JAP_base_removal_promised } } }
	}

	#Reject Japan's Demand
	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				FROM = {
					OR = {
						is_in_array = { ruling_party = 0 }
						is_in_array = { ruling_party = 1 }
						is_in_array = { ruling_party = 2 }
						is_in_array = { ruling_party = 3 }
						is_in_array = { ruling_party = 6 }
						is_in_array = { ruling_party = 7 }
						is_in_array = { ruling_party = 13 }
						is_in_array = { ruling_party = 15 }
						is_in_array = { ruling_party = 16 }
						is_in_array = { ruling_party = 17 }
						is_in_array = { ruling_party = 20 }
						is_in_array = { ruling_party = 21 }
						is_in_array = { ruling_party = 22 }
						is_in_array = { ruling_party = 23 }
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				OR = {
					any_country = {
						original_tag = CHI
						OR = {
							has_war_with = JAP
							has_war_with = USA
							has_war_with = TAI
							has_war_with = VIE
							has_war_with = PHI
							has_war_with = MAY
							has_war_with = IND
							has_war_with = RAJ
						}
					}
					any_country = {
						original_tag = NKO
						OR = {
							has_war_with = JAP
							has_war_with = USA
							has_war_with = KOR
						}
					}
					any_country = {
						original_tag = SOV
						OR = {
							has_war_with = JAP
							has_war_with = USA
							has_war_with = FIN
							has_war_with = SWE
							has_war_with = FRA
							has_war_with = GER
							has_war_with = ENG
							has_war_with = UKR
						}
					}
					AND = {
						OR = {
							tag = TAI
							tag = KOR
						}
						exists = no
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		name = mdmosjap_japan.1660201.oB
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japan.1660201.oB"
		add_political_power = -200
		effect_tooltip = { JAP = { add_opinion_modifier = { target = USA modifier = mdmosjap_opinion_USA_JAP_base_removal_rejected } } }
		FROM = { country_event = mdmosjap_japan.1660203 }

#U.S. Promises to return the land in Okinawa
country_event = {
	id = mdmosjap_japan.1660202
	title = mdmosjap_japan.1660202.t
	desc = mdmosjap_japan.1660202.d
	#picture = GFX_news_event_hearts_of_iron_4

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		set_variable = { mdmosjap_var_futenma_returning_stage = 0 }
		set_variable = { mdmosjap_var_futenma_returning_stage_tt = 5 }
	}

	option = {
		name = mdmosjap_japan.1660202.oA
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japan.1660202.oA"
		add_political_power = 100
		mdmosjap_increase_ruling_party_popularity_5 = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 2 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 3 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 4 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 5 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 16 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 17 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 18 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 19 }
				}
			}
			decrease_mdmosjap_conrad_left_1 = yes
			increase_mdmosjap_conrad_right_5 = yes

		} else_if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 6 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 7 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 20 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 21 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 22 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 23 }
				}
			}
			increase_mdmosjap_conrad_left_5 = yes
			decrease_mdmosjap_conrad_right_1 = yes
		} else = {
			decrease_mdmosjap_conrad_left_3 = yes
			decrease_mdmosjap_conrad_right_3 = yes
		}
		increase_mdmosjap_concon_right_2 = yes
		add_ideas = JAP_base_removal_in_okinawa1
		set_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_NF_RECLAIM_FUTENMA_USA_PROMISED
		add_opinion_modifier = { target = USA modifier = mdmosjap_opinion_USA_JAP_base_removal_promised }
		activate_mission = mdmosjap_JAP_retreat_of_usfj
		hidden_effect = { news_event = mdmosjap_japannews.1660202 }
	}
}

	is_triggered_only = yes

			remove_state_core = 827
		}
		JAP = {
			transfer_state = 827
			add_state_core = 827
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = JAP_base_removal_in_okinawa1 }
			remove_ideas = JAP_base_removal_in_okinawa1
		}
		if = {	#Support limitedly
			limit = { has_idea = JAP_base_removal_in_okinawa2 }
			remove_ideas = JAP_base_removal_in_okinawa2
			add_timed_idea = { idea = JAP_base_removal_in_okinawa_localsupport1 days = 1825 }
		}
		if = {	#Support fully
			limit = { has_idea = JAP_base_removal_in_okinawa3 }
			remove_ideas = JAP_base_removal_in_okinawa3
			add_timed_idea = { idea = JAP_base_removal_in_okinawa_localsupport2 days = 1825 }
		}
		set_temp_variable = { mdmosjap_temp_var_futenma_new_building_slot = 0 }
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_NF_RECLAIM_FUTENMA_RETURN_EVERY_LANDS }
			add_to_temp_variable = { mdmosjap_temp_var_futenma_new_building_slot = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_NF_RECLAIM_FUTENMA_RETURN_EVERY_LANDS } }
			add_to_temp_variable = { mdmosjap_temp_var_futenma_new_building_slot = 2 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_NF_RECLAIM_FUTENMA_FUTENMA_REDEVELOPMENT }

				custom_effect_tooltip = MDMOSJAP_NF_RECLAIM_FUTENMA_DESTROY_ALL_MILIFACILITIES_TT
				hidden_effect = {
					if = {
						limit = { dockyard > 0 }
						remove_building = { type = dockyard level = 99 }
					}
					if = {
						limit = { arms_factory > 0 }
						remove_building = { type = arms_factory level = 99 }
					}
					if = {
						limit = { air_base > 0 }
						remove_building = { type = air_base level = 99 }
					}
					if = {
						limit = { radar_station > 0 }
						remove_building = { type = radar_station level = 99 }
					}
					if = {
						limit = { anti_air_building > 0 }
						remove_building = { type = anti_air_building level = 99 }
					}
					if = {
						limit = { missile_defense_station > 0 }
						remove_building = { type = missile_defense_station level = 99 }
					}
					if = {
						limit = { TEL_base > 0 }
						remove_building = { type = TEL_base level = 99 }
					}
					if = {
						limit = { missile_silo > 0 }
						remove_building = { type = missile_silo level = 99 }
					}
					if = {
						limit = { nuclear_reactor > 0 }
						remove_building = { type = nuclear_reactor level = 99 }
					}
					if = {
						limit = { fuel_silo > 0 }
						remove_building = { type = fuel_silo level = 99 }
					}
				}
			}
			add_to_temp_variable = { mdmosjap_temp_var_futenma_new_building_slot = 2 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_NF_RECLAIM_FUTENMA_FUTENMA_JASDF_AIR_BASE }
			827 = {

					}
				}
			}

			set_state_name = mdmosjap_rename_STATE_827

				limit = { NOT = { is_core_of = RYU } }

			}

		set_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_NF_RECLAIM_FUTENMA_USA_HAS_WITHDRAWN
		remove_mission = mdmosjap_JAP_retreat_of_usfj

					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 5 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 18 }

				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		name = mdmosjap_japan.1660209.oB
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japan.1660209.oB"
		add_stability = -0.01
		add_opinion_modifier = { target = FROM modifier = mdmosjap_opinion_USA_JAP_broken_promise_by_war_month }
		effect_tooltip = { remove_mission = mdmosjap_JAP_retreat_of_usfj }

			JAP = { country_event = { id = mdmosjap_japan.1660211 days = 3 } }

			factor = 10
			modifier = {

					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 0 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 1 }
				}
				factor = 0.02
			}
			modifier = {
				OR = {
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 6 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 7 }
				}
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				AND = {
					has_completed_focus = JAP_china_encirclement
					CHI = {
						AND = {
							exists = yes
							is_puppet = no
							is_subject = no
							NOT = { is_in_faction_with = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		name = mdmosjap_japan.1604001.oA
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japan.1604001.oA"
		USA = { country_event = { id = mdmosjap_japan.1604002 days = 1 } }
	}

	#Ask the United States to maintain there as the U.S.F.J. base
	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {

			}

				}
				factor = 0

		}

		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japan.1604001.oB"

					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 5 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 18 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 19 }
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		name = mdmosjap_japan.1604009.oB
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japan.1604009.oB"
		add_political_power = -100
		FROM = { country_event = { id = mdmosjap_japan.1604011 days = 1 } }
	}
}

#Japan Refused to Return Futenma!
country_event = {
	id = mdmosjap_japan.1604011
	title = mdmosjap_japan.1604011.t
	desc = mdmosjap_japan.1604011.d
	#picture = GFX_news_event_hearts_of_iron_4

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	#We never forget this (but do nothing)
	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
		}
		name = mdmosjap_japan.1604011.oA
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japan.1604011.oA"
		add_political_power = -200
		add_war_support = 0.05
		if = {
			limit = { has_government = nationalist }
			add_popularity = { ideology = democratic popularity = 0.05 }
		}
	}

	#Now we will take our land by force (Gain the Casus Belli)
	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				any_other_country = {
					AND = {
						is_in_faction_with = ROOT
						is_major = no
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		name = mdmosjap_japan.1604011.oB
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japan.1604012.oB"
		add_political_power = -200
		add_war_support = 0.05
		if = {
			limit = { has_government = nationalist }
			add_popularity = { ideology = democratic popularity = 0.05 }
		}
		create_wargoal = { type = take_state_focus target = FROM generator = { 827 } }
	}
}

#Establishment of Autonomous State of Okinawa
country_event = {
	id = mdmosjap_japan.1670402
	title = mdmosjap_japan.1670402.t
	desc = mdmosjap_japan.1670402.d
	#picture = GFX_news_event_hearts_of_iron_4

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	#New start for Okinawa!
	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				is_ai = yes
				factor = 100
			}
		}
		name = mdmosjap_japan.1670402.oA
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japan.1670402.oA"
		#Core-isation
		RYU = {
			add_state_core = 618
			add_state_core = 827
		}
		#Transferring States
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_core_of = RYU
				is_owned_by = JAP
			}
			RYU = { transfer_state = PREV }
		}
		#Puppet-isation
		JAP = {
			puppet = RYU
			set_autonomy = { target = RYU autonomy_state = autonomy_associated_state }
		}
		#Policies by the Suzerain
		RYU = {
			hidden_effect = {
				set_cosmetic_tag = RYU_JAP
				REDISTRIBUTE_MDMOSJAP_RYU_GOVERNMENT_SETUP = yes
			}
		}

		increase_mdmosjap_conrad_right_10 = yes
	}

	#New start for Okinawa! (Play as RYU)
	option = {
		trigger = { is_ai = no }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				is_ai = yes
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		name = mdmosjap_japan.1670402.oB
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japan.1670402.oB"
		#Core-isation
		RYU = {
			add_state_core = 618
			add_state_core = 827
		}
		#Transferring States
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_core_of = RYU
				is_owned_by = JAP
			}
			RYU = { transfer_state = PREV }
		}
		#Puppet-isation
		JAP = {
			puppet = RYU
			set_autonomy = { target = RYU autonomy_state = autonomy_associated_state }
		}
		#Policies by the Suzerain
		RYU = {
			hidden_effect = {
				set_cosmetic_tag = RYU_JAP
				REDISTRIBUTE_MDMOSJAP_RYU_GOVERNMENT_SETUP = yes
			}
		}
		RYU = { change_tag_from = JAP }

		increase_mdmosjap_conrad_left_4 = yes
		increase_mdmosjap_conrad_right_6 = yes
	}
}

#Start Meeting (USA)
country_event = {
	id = mdmosjap_japan.1640302
	title = mdmosjap_japan.1640302.t
	desc = mdmosjap_japan.1640302.d
	#picture = GFX_news_event_hearts_of_iron_4

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	timeout_days = 3

	#Agree with all of their demands
	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				OR = {
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 4 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 5 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 18 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 19 }
				}
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				OR = {
					KUW = { has_idea = JAP_KUW_SOFA }
					DJI = { has_idea = JAP_DJI_SOFA }
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		name = mdmosjap_japan.1640302.oA
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japan.1640302.oA"
		JAP = { set_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_NF_CHALLENGE_TO_SOFA_AGREED_FULLY }
	}

	#Reject any of their demands
	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				OR = {
					KUW = { has_idea = JAP_KUW_SOFA }
					DJI = { has_idea = JAP_DJI_SOFA }
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		name = mdmosjap_japan.1640302.oB
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japan.1640302.oB"
		JAP = { set_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_NF_CHALLENGE_TO_SOFA_REJECTED }
	}

	#We accuse their own SOFA
	option = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				KUW = { has_idea = JAP_KUW_SOFA }
				DJI = { has_idea = JAP_DJI_SOFA }
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
		name = mdmosjap_japan.1640302.oC
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japan.1640302.oC"
		if = {
			limit = { KUW = { has_idea = JAP_KUW_SOFA } }
			JAP = { country_event = { id = mdmosjap_japan.1640307 days = 3 } }
		} else_if = {
			limit = { DJI = { has_idea = JAP_DJI_SOFA } }
			JAP = { country_event = { id = mdmosjap_japan.1640310 days = 3 } }
		}
	}
}

#//////// Final Agreement of War Crimes /////////
#Proposal to the signing of Final Agreement
country_event = {
	id = mdmosjap_japan.1640801
	title = mdmosjap_japan.1640801.t
	desc = mdmosjap_japan.1640801.d
	#picture = GFX_news_event_hearts_of_iron_4

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	#Let's propose the \"mutual agreement\" with South Korea.
	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 99
			modifier = {
				OR = {
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 3 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 4 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 5 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 17 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 18 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 19 }
					AND = {
						is_in_array = { ruling_party = 2 }
						has_country_leader = { name = "Yukio Hatoyama" }
					}
					#AND = {
					#	is_in_array = { ruling_party = 23 }
					#	has_country_leader = { name = "Japan Regent Congress" }
					#}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		name = mdmosjap_japan.1640801.oA
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japan.1640801.oA"
		KOR = { country_event = { id = mdmosjap_japan.1640802 days = 1 } }
	}

	#We just apologise for the past war crime.
	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				OR = {
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 3 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 4 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 5 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 17 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 18 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 19 }
					AND = {
						is_in_array = { ruling_party = 2 }
						has_country_leader = { name = "Yukio Hatoyama" }
					}
					#AND = {
					#	is_in_array = { ruling_party = 23 }
					#	has_country_leader = { name = "Japan Regent Congress" }
					#}
				}
				factor = 100
			}
		}
		name = mdmosjap_japan.1640801.oB
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japan.1640801.oB"
		KOR = { country_event = { id = mdmosjap_japan.1640805 days = 1 } }
		add_political_power = -150
	}
}

		JAP = { country_event = { id = mdmosjap_japan.1640803 days = 1 } }
	#	country_event = { id = mdmosjap_japan.1640810 days = 2 }
	#	country_event = { id = mdmosjap_japan.1640811 days = 3 }
		country_event = { id = mdmosjap_japan.1640831 days = 550 }
		set_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_KOR_FINAL_AGREEMENT_MUTUAL
	}

	#Refuse this. Why should we swallow their forcible agreement again?!
	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				OR = {
					is_historical_focus_on = yes
					KOR = { NOT = { has_country_leader = { name = "Park Geun-hye" } } }
					JAP = { is_in_array = { ruling_party = 6 } }
					JAP = { is_in_array = { ruling_party = 13 } }
					JAP = { is_in_array = { ruling_party = 14 } }
					JAP = { is_in_array = { ruling_party = 15 } }
					JAP = { is_in_array = { ruling_party = 20 } }
					JAP = { is_in_array = { ruling_party = 21 } }
					JAP = { is_in_array = { ruling_party = 22 } }
					JAP = { is_in_faction_with = NKO }
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		name = mdmosjap_japan.1640802.oB
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japan.1640802.oB"
		JAP = { country_event = { id = mdmosjap_japan.1640804 days = 1 } }
		add_political_power = -100
	}
}

			}
		}
		KOR = {
			remove_opinion_modifier = {
				target = JAP
				modifier = refuse_to_apologize_for_warcrimes
			}
			add_opinion_modifier = {
				target = JAP
				modifier = mdmosjap_opinion_KOR_final_agreement_accepted
			}
		}
		add_stability = 0.05
		country_event = { id = mdmosjap_japan.1640808 days = 1 }
	#	country_event = { id = mdmosjap_japan.1640809 days = 2 }
		news_event = mdmosjap_japannews.1640806
		set_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_JAP_FINAL_AGREEMENT_TOTAL_APOLOGISE
	}
}
