					has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_PROGOLFER_MORI

		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_TRAITMEMORY_UYO }
			add_country_leader_trait = uyoku_supporter
			clr_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_TRAITMEMORY_UYO
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_TRAITMEMORY_SAYO }
			add_country_leader_trait = sayoku_supporter
			clr_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_TRAITMEMORY_SAYO
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_TRAITMEMORY_CONSERVATIVE_LIB }
			add_country_leader_trait = conservative_lib
			clr_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_TRAITMEMORY_CONSERVATIVE_LIB
		}
	}
}

#Regime Change: array^1
country_event = {
	id = mdmosjap_japanelection.10101
	title = mdmosjap_japanelection.10101.t
	desc = mdmosjap_japanelection.10101.d
	#picture = GFX_news_event_hearts_of_iron_4

	is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		JAP = {
			clear_array = ruling_party
			clear_array = gov_coalition_array
			add_to_array = { ruling_party = 1 }

			clr_country_flag = coalition_forming
			hidden_effect = { remove_mission = coalition_countdown }
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = mdmosjap_japanelection.10101.oA
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japanelection.10101.oA"
		#Mori Yoshiro (Before Ehimemaru or Quit Golf)
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_MORI_RESIGNED }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_PROGOLFER_MORI }
				}
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Yoshiro Mori"
				picture = "yoshiro_mori.dds"
				ideology = conservatism
				traits = {
					western_conservatism
					emotional
					stubborn
					narcissist
				}
			}
		}
		#Mori Yoshiro (After Ehimemaru and Played Golf)
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_MORI_RESIGNED }
					has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_PROGOLFER
					NOT = { has_country_leader = { name = "Junichiro Koizumi" } }		#For flag error
				}
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Yoshiro Mori"
				picture = "yoshiro_mori.dds"
				ideology = conservatism
				traits = {
					western_conservatism
					emotional
					stubborn
					narcissist
					incapable
				}
			}
		}

		### PUT KATO HERE IF THE CONCEPTION OF AN ALTERNATIVE HISTORY HAS JELLED

		#Koizumi Junichiro
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_MORI_RESIGNED
						NOT = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_KOIZUMI_RESIGNED }
					}
					has_country_leader = { name = "Junichiro Koizumi" }		#For flag error
				}
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Junichiro Koizumi"
				picture = "junichiro_koizumi.dds"
				ideology = conservatism
				traits = {
					western_conservatism
					emotional
					stubborn
				#	austerity_economics
					mediafuror
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_ZAITOKUKAI }
				add_country_leader_trait = uyoku_supporter
			}
		}
		#Shinzo Abe (First Time)
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_KOIZUMI_RESIGNED
				NOT = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_ABE_RESIGNED_I }
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Shinzo Abe"
				picture = "Shinzo_Abe.dds"
				ideology = conservatism
				traits = {
					western_conservatism
					emotional
					zealous
					stubborn
					wgip
					antikorea
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_ZAITOKUKAI }
				add_country_leader_trait = uyoku_supporter
			}
		}
		#Yasuo Fukuda
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_ABE_RESIGNED_I
				NOT = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_FUKUDA_RESIGNED }
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Yasuo Fukuda"
				picture = "yasuo_fukuda.dds"
				ideology = conservatism
				traits = {
					western_conservatism
					rational
					cautious
					humble
					pro_china
					conservative_lib
				}
			}
		}
		#Taro Aso
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_FUKUDA_RESIGNED
				NOT = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_ASO_RESIGNED }
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Taro Aso"
				picture = "taro_aso.dds"
				ideology = conservatism
				traits = {
					western_conservatism
					emotional
					rash
					stubborn
					narcissist
					polished
					likeable
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_ZAITOKUKAI }
				add_country_leader_trait = uyoku_supporter
			}
		}

		### PUT ADDITIONAL LEADERS HERE IF THE CONCEPTION OF AN ALTERNATIVE HISTORY ABOUT WHAT IF LDP WON THE 2009 LOWER HOUSE ELECTION HAS JELLED
		### e.g. SADAKAZU TANIGAKI, SHIGERU ISHIBA, TARO ASO, SHINJIRO KOIZUMI, etc
				#NOT = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_TANIGAKI_RESIGNED }
				#NOT = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_ISHIBA_RESIGNED }
				#NOT = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_MACHIMURA_RESIGNED }
				#NOT = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_ISHIHARA_RESIGNED }

		#Shinzo Abe (Second Time)
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_ASO_RESIGNED
				has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_2012_LDP_PRESIDENT_ABE

			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Shinzo Abe"
				picture = "Shinzo_Abe.dds"
				ideology = conservatism
				traits = {
					western_conservatism
					emotional
					zealous
					stubborn
					wgip
					antikorea
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_ZAITOKUKAI }
				add_country_leader_trait = uyoku_supporter
			}
		}
		#Shigeru Ishiba
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_ASO_RESIGNED
				has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_2012_LDP_PRESIDENT_ISHIBA
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Shigeru Ishiba"
				picture = "Shigeru_Ishiba.dds"
				ideology = conservatism
				traits = {
					western_conservatism
					cautious
					stubborn
					likeable
					capable
					military_genius
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_ZAITOKUKAI }
				add_country_leader_trait = uyoku_supporter
			}
		}
		#Nobuteru Ishihara
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_ASO_RESIGNED
				has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_2012_LDP_PRESIDENT_ISHIHARA
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Nobuteru Ishihara"
				picture = "Nobuteru_Ishihara.dds"
				ideology = conservatism
				traits = {
					western_conservatism
					rational
					humble
					narcissist
					geopolitical_thinker
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_ZAITOKUKAI }
				add_country_leader_trait = uyoku_supporter
			}
		}
		news_event = { id = News_MD4_election.2 days = 1 }

		#Trait Load
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_TRAITMEMORY_ABDUCTEE_RESCUER1 }
			add_country_leader_trait = abductee_rescuer1
			clr_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_TRAITMEMORY_ABDUCTEE_RESCUER1
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_TRAITMEMORY_ABDUCTEE_RESCUER2 }
			add_country_leader_trait = abductee_rescuer2
			clr_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_TRAITMEMORY_ABDUCTEE_RESCUER2
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_TRAITMEMORY_UYO }
			add_country_leader_trait = uyoku_supporter
			clr_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_TRAITMEMORY_UYO
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_TRAITMEMORY_SAYO }
			add_country_leader_trait = sayoku_supporter
			clr_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_TRAITMEMORY_SAYO
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_TRAITMEMORY_CONSERVATIVE_LIB }
			add_country_leader_trait = conservative_lib
			clr_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_TRAITMEMORY_CONSERVATIVE_LIB
		}
	}
}

#Regime Change: array^2
country_event = {
	id = mdmosjap_japanelection.10201
	title = mdmosjap_japanelection.10201.t
	desc = mdmosjap_japanelection.10201.d
	#picture = GFX_news_event_hearts_of_iron_4

	is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		JAP = {
			clear_array = ruling_party
			clear_array = gov_coalition_array
			add_to_array = { ruling_party = 2 }

			clr_country_flag = coalition_forming
			hidden_effect = { remove_mission = coalition_countdown }
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = mdmosjap_japanelection.10201.oA
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japanelection.10201.oA"
		#Yukio Hatoyama
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_WESTLIB_NAOTO_KAN }
					has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_WESTLIB_YUKIO_HATOYAMA
				}
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Yukio Hatoyama"
				picture = "yukio_hatoyama.dds"
				ideology = liberalism
				traits = {
					western_liberalism
					stubborn
					polished
					inexperienced
					pro_china
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_ZAITOKUKAI }
				add_country_leader_trait = sayoku_supporter
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_WESTLIB_NAOTO_KAN
					NOT = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_WESTLIB_YUKIO_HATOYAMA }
				}
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Naoto Kan"
				picture = "naoto_kan.dds"
				ideology = liberalism
				traits = {
					western_liberalism
					emotional
					stubborn
					tech_savy
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_ZAITOKUKAI }
				add_country_leader_trait = sayoku_supporter
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_KAN_RESIGNED
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Yoshihiko Noda"
				picture = "yoshihiko_noda.dds"
				ideology = liberalism
				traits = {
					western_liberalism
					humble
					political_dancer
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_ZAITOKUKAI }
				add_country_leader_trait = uyoku_supporter
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_NODA_RESIGNED
				has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_DPJ_SURVIVED
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Banri Kaieda"
				picture = "Banri_Kaieda.dds"
				ideology = liberalism
				traits = {
					western_liberalism
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_ZAITOKUKAI }
				add_country_leader_trait = sayoku_supporter
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_NODA_RESIGNED
				has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_DPJ_SURVIVED
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Ichiro Ozawa"
				picture = "ichiro_ozawa.dds"
				ideology = liberalism
				traits = {
					western_liberalism
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_ZAITOKUKAI }
				add_country_leader_trait = sayoku_supporter
			}
		}
		news_event = { id = News_MD4_election.2 days = 1 }

		#Trait Load
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_TRAITMEMORY_ABDUCTEE_RESCUER1 }
			add_country_leader_trait = abductee_rescuer1
			clr_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_TRAITMEMORY_ABDUCTEE_RESCUER1
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_TRAITMEMORY_ABDUCTEE_RESCUER2 }
			add_country_leader_trait = abductee_rescuer2
			clr_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_TRAITMEMORY_ABDUCTEE_RESCUER2
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_TRAITMEMORY_UYO }
			add_country_leader_trait = uyoku_supporter
			clr_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_TRAITMEMORY_UYO
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_TRAITMEMORY_SAYO }
			add_country_leader_trait = sayoku_supporter
			clr_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_TRAITMEMORY_SAYO
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_TRAITMEMORY_CONSERVATIVE_LIB }
			add_country_leader_trait = conservative_lib
			clr_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_TRAITMEMORY_CONSERVATIVE_LIB
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = mdmosjap_japanelection.10301
	title = mdmosjap_japanelection.10301.t
	desc = mdmosjap_japanelection.10301.d
	#picture = GFX_news_event_hearts_of_iron_4

	is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		JAP = {
			clear_array = ruling_party
			clear_array = gov_coalition_array
			add_to_array = { ruling_party = 3 }

			clr_country_flag = coalition_forming
			hidden_effect = { remove_mission = coalition_countdown }
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = mdmosjap_japanelection.10301.oA
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japanelection.10301.oA"
		#Yukio Hatoyama
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_WESTSOC_MIZUHO_FUKUSHIMA }
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Takako Doi"
				picture = "takako_doi.dds"
				ideology = socialism
				traits = {
					western_socialism
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_WESTSOC_MIZUHO_FUKUSHIMA
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Mizuho Fukushima"
				picture = "mizuho_fukushima.dds"
				ideology = socialism
				traits = {
					western_socialism
				}
			}
		}
		news_event = { id = News_MD4_election.2 days = 1 }

		#Trait Load
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_TRAITMEMORY_ABDUCTEE_RESCUER1 }
			add_country_leader_trait = abductee_rescuer1
			clr_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_TRAITMEMORY_ABDUCTEE_RESCUER1
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_TRAITMEMORY_ABDUCTEE_RESCUER2 }
			add_country_leader_trait = abductee_rescuer2
			clr_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_TRAITMEMORY_ABDUCTEE_RESCUER2
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_TRAITMEMORY_UYO }
			add_country_leader_trait = uyoku_supporter
			clr_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_TRAITMEMORY_UYO
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_TRAITMEMORY_SAYO }
			add_country_leader_trait = sayoku_supporter
			clr_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_TRAITMEMORY_SAYO
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_TRAITMEMORY_CONSERVATIVE_LIB }
			add_country_leader_trait = conservative_lib
			clr_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_TRAITMEMORY_CONSERVATIVE_LIB
		}

		clr_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_LOWER_ELECTION
	}
}

				#NOT = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_ISHIBA_RESIGNED }
				#NOT = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_MACHIMURA_RESIGNED }
				#NOT = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_ISHIHARA_RESIGNED }

		#Shinzo Abe (Second Time)
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_historical_focus_on = yes
				has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_ASO_RESIGNED
				has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_2012_LDP_PRESIDENT_ABE
				has_country_leader = { name = "Shinzo Abe" }
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Shinzo Abe"
				picture = "Shinzo_Abe.dds"
				ideology = conservatism
				traits = {
					western_conservatism
					emotional
					zealous
					stubborn
					wgip
					antikorea
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_ZAITOKUKAI }
				add_country_leader_trait = uyoku_supporter
			}
		}
		#Shigeru Ishiba
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_historical_focus_on = yes
				has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_ASO_RESIGNED
				has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_2012_LDP_PRESIDENT_ISHIBA
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Shigeru Ishiba"
				picture = "Shigeru_Ishiba.dds"
				ideology = conservatism
				traits = {
					western_conservatism
					cautious
					stubborn
					likeable
					capable
					military_genius
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_ZAITOKUKAI }
				add_country_leader_trait = uyoku_supporter
			}
		}
		#Nobuteru Ishihara
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_historical_focus_on = yes
				has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_ASO_RESIGNED
				has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_2012_LDP_PRESIDENT_ISHIHARA
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Nobuteru Ishihara"
				picture = "Nobuteru_Ishihara.dds"

					western_conservatism

					geopolitical_thinker
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_ZAITOKUKAI }
				add_country_leader_trait = uyoku_supporter
			}
		}

			}

		}

			add_country_leader_trait = conservative_lib
			clr_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_TRAITMEMORY_CONSERVATIVE_LIB
		}
	}

country_event = {
	id = mdmosjap_japanelection.2002
	title = mdmosjap_japanelection.2002.t
	desc = mdmosjap_japanelection.2002.d
	#picture = GFX_news_event_hearts_of_iron_4

	is_triggered_only = yes

	#It's a bit too early to do...
	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				NOT = { is_historical_focus_on = yes }
				factor = 0.2
			}
			modifier = {
				AND = {
					OR = {
						is_in_array = { ruling_party = 0 }
						is_in_array = { ruling_party = 1 }
						is_in_array = { ruling_party = 6 }
						is_in_array = { ruling_party = 7 }
						is_in_array = { ruling_party = 20 }
						is_in_array = { ruling_party = 21 }
						is_in_array = { ruling_party = 22 }
						is_in_array = { ruling_party = 23 }
					}
					is_historical_focus_on = yes
					date > 2021.1.0
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		name = mdmosjap_japanelection.2002.oA
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japanelection.2002.oA"
		decrease_mdmosjap_conrad_left_1 = yes
		increase_mdmosjap_conrad_right_2 = yes
		add_political_power = -100
	}

	#... It's time to make a epic move.
	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				OR = {
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 2 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 3 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 4 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 5 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 17 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 18 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 19 }
				}
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				AND = {
					is_historical_focus_on = yes
					date < 2021.1.0
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		name = mdmosjap_japanelection.2002.oB
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japanelection.2002.oB"
		#increase_mdmosjap_conrad_left_10 = yes
		add_stability = -0.05
		activate_mission = mdmosjap_JAP_the_great_referendum
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_THE_GREAT_REFERENDUM_MALCONCLUSION } }
			country_event = { id = mdmosjap_japanelection.3001 days = 1 }	#The Party's Supportive Draft on the Amendment
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_THE_GREAT_REFERENDUM_MALCONCLUSION }
					has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_LOWER_ELECTION
				}
			}
			country_event = { id = mdmosjap_japanelection.3004 days = 2 }	#Grand Coalition for the Amendment
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_global_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_JAPAN_EXPERIENCED_FIRST_TIME_REFERENDUM } }
			news_event = mdmosjap_japannews.2002
		}
		set_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_THE_GREAT_REFERENDUM_ONGOING
		set_global_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_JAPAN_EXPERIENCED_FIRST_TIME_REFERENDUM
	}
}

		}

	}
}

#A Proposal of Grand Coalition toward the Amendment
country_event = {
	id = mdmosjap_japanelection.3004
	title = mdmosjap_japanelection.3004.t
	desc = mdmosjap_japanelection.3004.d
	#picture = GFX_news_event_hearts_of_iron_4

	is_triggered_only = yes

	#A golden opportunity! Let's call to form the coalition!
	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
		#	modifier = {
		#		check_variable = { government_coalition_strength > 0.666 }
		#		factor = 0
		#	}
		}
		name = mdmosjap_japanelection.3004.oA
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japanelection.3004.oA"
		custom_effect_tooltip = MDMOSJAP_enable_form_grand_coalition_TT
		ROOT = { set_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_GREAT_COALITION }
		country_event = { id = mdmosjap_japanelection.3006 days = 1 }
		hidden_effect = {
			recalculate_party = yes
			update_government_coalition_strength = yes
			update_party_name = yes
			set_coalition_drift = yes
		}
	}

	#Nah, our coalition is big enough.
	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				OR = {
					check_variable = { government_coalition_strength < 0.666 }
					check_variable = { government_coalition_strength = 0.666 }

					#RIGHT: LDP-JIP-DPFP TIE
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 0 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 1 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 6 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 7 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 15 }

					#LEFT: CDP-SDP-JCP TIE
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 2 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 3 }
					is_in_array = { ruling_party = 5 }

					#TIMEOUT BY PLAYER
					is_ai = no
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		name = mdmosjap_japanelection.3004.oB
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japanelection.3004.oB"
		mdmosjap_increase_ruling_party_popularity_3 = yes
		mdmosjap_increase_coalition_party_popularity_3 = yes
		add_stability = 0.03
		add_political_power = 100
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_LEFTMOD_ONGOING
					has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_LEFTRAD_ONGOING
				}
			}
			increase_mdmosjap_concon_left_1 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_RIGHTMOD_ONGOING
					has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_RIGHTRAD_ONGOING
				}
			}
			increase_mdmosjap_concon_right_1 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_THE_GREAT_REFERENDUM_MALCONCLUSION } }
			country_event = { id = mdmosjap_japanelection.3006 days = 1 }
		}
	}
}

#Budget Using in the Newspaper Advertising
country_event = {
	id = mdmosjap_japanelection.3006
	title = mdmosjap_japanelection.3006.t
	desc = mdmosjap_japanelection.3006.d
	#picture = GFX_news_event_hearts_of_iron_4

	is_triggered_only = yes

	#No advertising on newspapers
	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				is_historical_focus_on = yes
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		name = mdmosjap_japanelection.3006.oA
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japanelection.3006.oA"
		decrease_mdmosjap_conrad_left_1 = yes
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_THE_GREAT_REFERENDUM_MALCONCLUSION } }
			country_event = { id = mdmosjap_japanelection.3007 days = 1 }
		}
		set_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_ADVERTISING_NEWSPAPER_LESS
	}

	#Bottom of a page
	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 9
			modifier = {
				is_historical_focus_on = yes
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		name = mdmosjap_japanelection.3006.oB
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japanelection.3006.oB"
		add_political_power = -100
		increase_mdmosjap_concon_right_1 = yes
		mdmosjap_increase_ruling_party_popularity_2 = yes
		mdmosjap_increase_coalition_party_popularity_1 = yes
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_THE_GREAT_REFERENDUM_MALCONCLUSION } }
			country_event = { id = mdmosjap_japanelection.3007 days = 1 }
		}
	}

	#Occupy two pages
	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 90
		}
		name = mdmosjap_japanelection.3006.oC
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japanelection.3006.oC"
		add_political_power = -200
		increase_mdmosjap_concon_right_1 = yes
		increase_mdmosjap_conrad_left_1 = yes
		mdmosjap_increase_ruling_party_popularity_4 = yes
		mdmosjap_increase_coalition_party_popularity_2 = yes
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_THE_GREAT_REFERENDUM_MALCONCLUSION } }
			country_event = { id = mdmosjap_japanelection.3007 days = 1 }
		}
		set_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_ADVERTISING_NEWSPAPER_MUCH
	}
}

			}

		mdmosjap_increase_coalition_party_popularity_2 = yes

		}

#Counter Advertising by Protectionists
country_event = {
	id = mdmosjap_japanelection.3009
	title = mdmosjap_japanelection.3009.t
	desc = mdmosjap_japanelection.3009.d
	#picture = GFX_news_event_hearts_of_iron_4

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = mdmosjap_japanelection.3009.oA
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japanelection.3009.oA"
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					check_variable = { government_coalition_strength < 0.333 }
					check_variable = { government_coalition_strength = 0.333 }
				}
			}
			increase_mdmosjap_concon_left_10 = yes
			increase_mdmosjap_conrad_left_1 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					check_variable = { government_coalition_strength > 0.334 }
					check_variable = { government_coalition_strength = 0.334 }
					check_variable = { government_coalition_strength < 0.666 }
					check_variable = { government_coalition_strength = 0.666 }
				}
			}
			increase_mdmosjap_concon_left_7 = yes
			increase_mdmosjap_conrad_left_2 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					check_variable = { government_coalition_strength > 0.667 }
					check_variable = { government_coalition_strength = 0.667 }
				}
			}
			increase_mdmosjap_concon_left_4 = yes
			increase_mdmosjap_conrad_left_3 = yes
		}
		increase_mdmosjap_conrad_right_2 = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_THE_GREAT_REFERENDUM_MALCONCLUSION }
				has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_ADVERTISING_NEWSPAPER_LESS
				has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_ADVERTISING_BROADCAST_LESS
				has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_ADVERTISING_INTERNET_LESS
			}
			country_event = { id = mdmosjap_japanelection.3010 days = 3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_THE_GREAT_REFERENDUM_MALCONCLUSION }
				has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_ADVERTISING_NEWSPAPER_MUCH
				has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_ADVERTISING_BROADCAST_MUCH
				has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_ADVERTISING_INTERNET_MUCH
			}
			country_event = { id = mdmosjap_japanelection.3011 days = 3 }
		}
	}
}

	id = mdmosjap_japanelection.3011
	title = mdmosjap_japanelection.3011.t
	desc = mdmosjap_japanelection.3011.d
	#picture = GFX_news_event_hearts_of_iron_4

	is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		clr_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_ADVERTISING_NEWSPAPER_MUCH
		clr_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_ADVERTISING_BROADCAST_MUCH
		clr_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_ADVERTISING_INTERNET_MUCH
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_RIGHTMOD_ONGOING }
			set_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_FIRSTTIME_RIGHTMOD_MAKES_EFFORT
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_RIGHTRAD_ONGOING }
			set_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_FIRSTTIME_RIGHTRAD_MAKES_EFFORT
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_LEFTMOD_ONGOING }
			set_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_FIRSTTIME_LEFTMOD_MAKES_EFFORT
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_LEFTRAD_ONGOING }
			set_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_FIRSTTIME_LEFTRAD_MAKES_EFFORT
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = mdmosjap_japanelection.3011.oA
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japanelection.3011.oA"
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_RIGHTMOD_ONGOING }
			increase_mdmosjap_concon_right_5 = yes
			increase_mdmosjap_conrad_left_2 = yes
			add_stability = -0.03
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_RIGHTRAD_ONGOING }
			increase_mdmosjap_concon_right_5 = yes
			increase_mdmosjap_conrad_left_4 = yes
			add_stability = -0.05
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_LEFTMOD_ONGOING }
			increase_mdmosjap_concon_right_5 = yes
			increase_mdmosjap_conrad_right_2 = yes
			add_stability = -0.03
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_LEFTRAD_ONGOING }
			increase_mdmosjap_concon_right_5 = yes
			increase_mdmosjap_conrad_right_4 = yes
			add_stability = -0.05
		}
	}
}

#The Day of Referendum
country_event = {
	id = mdmosjap_japanelection.3201
	title = mdmosjap_japanelection.3201.t
	desc = mdmosjap_japanelection.3201.d
	#picture = GFX_news_event_hearts_of_iron_4

	is_triggered_only = yes
	#immediate = { ROOT = { set_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_THE_GREAT_REFERENDUM_MALCONCLUSION } }

	#The amendment has been approved by the nation
	option = {
		trigger = { check_variable = { mdmosjap_JAP_var_RightCon > 50 } }
		name = mdmosjap_japanelection.3201.oA
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japanelection.3201.oA"
		add_stability = 0.03
		set_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_REVISE_APPROVED
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_LEFTMOD_ONGOING
					has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_RIGHTMOD_ONGOING
				}
			}
			add_named_threat = { threat = 1.0 name = MDMOSJAP_referendum_approved_moderate_amendment }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_LEFTRAD_ONGOING
					has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_RIGHTRAD_ONGOING
				}
			}
			add_named_threat = { threat = 2.0 name = MDMOSJAP_referendum_approved_radical_amendment }
		}
		country_event = { id = mdmosjap_japanelection.3202 days = 1 }		#Protectionists growling about the procedure of referendum
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = mdmosjap_japanelection.3205 months = 6 }		#[HIDDEN]Amendment Deadline: First AFK Check
		}
		set_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_AMENDMENT_DEADLINE_TICKING
		complete_national_focus = JAP_amendment_election
		news_event = mdmosjap_japannews.3202
	}

	#The amendment has been rejected by the nation
	option = {
		trigger = { check_variable = { mdmosjap_JAP_var_RightCon < 50 } }
		name = mdmosjap_japanelection.3201.oB
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japanelection.3201.oB"
		add_stability = 0.03
		#set_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_REVISE_REJECTED
		decrease_mdmosjap_concon_right_10 = yes
		country_event = { id = mdmosjap_japanelection.3302 days = 1 }
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_LEFTMOD_ONGOING }
			clr_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_LEFTMOD_ONGOING
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_LEFTRAD_ONGOING }
			clr_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_LEFTRAD_ONGOING
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_RIGHTMOD_ONGOING }
			clr_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_RIGHTMOD_ONGOING
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_RIGHTRAD_ONGOING }
			clr_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_RIGHTRAD_ONGOING
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_FIRSTTIME_LEFTMOD_DIDNT_EFFORT }
			clr_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_FIRSTTIME_LEFTMOD_DIDNT_EFFORT
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_FIRSTTIME_LEFTRAD_DIDNT_EFFORT }
			clr_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_FIRSTTIME_LEFTRAD_DIDNT_EFFORT
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_FIRSTTIME_RIGHTMOD_DIDNT_EFFORT }
			clr_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_FIRSTTIME_RIGHTMOD_DIDNT_EFFORT
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_FIRSTTIME_RIGHTRAD_DIDNT_EFFORT }
			clr_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_FIRSTTIME_RIGHTRAD_DIDNT_EFFORT
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_FIRSTTIME_LEFTMOD_MAKES_EFFORT }
			clr_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_FIRSTTIME_LEFTMOD_MAKES_EFFORT
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_FIRSTTIME_LEFTRAD_MAKES_EFFORT }
			clr_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_FIRSTTIME_LEFTRAD_MAKES_EFFORT
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_FIRSTTIME_RIGHTMOD_MAKES_EFFORT }
			clr_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_FIRSTTIME_RIGHTMOD_MAKES_EFFORT
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_FIRSTTIME_RIGHTRAD_MAKES_EFFORT }
			clr_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_FIRSTTIME_RIGHTRAD_MAKES_EFFORT
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_SGI_MEMBERS_ANTAGONISING_AMENDMENT }
			clr_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_SGI_MEMBERS_ANTAGONISING_AMENDMENT
		}
		removeflag_mdmosjap_coalition_invitation = yes
		news_event = mdmosjap_japannews.3302
	}

	#The vote was tie; The amendment has been rejected.
	option = {
		trigger = { check_variable = { mdmosjap_JAP_var_RightCon = 50 } }
		name = mdmosjap_japanelection.3201.oC
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japanelection.3201.oC"
		add_stability = 0.03
		#set_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_REVISE_REJECTED
		decrease_mdmosjap_concon_right_5 = yes
		country_event = { id = mdmosjap_japanelection.3302 days = 1 }
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_LEFTMOD_ONGOING }
			clr_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_LEFTMOD_ONGOING
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_LEFTRAD_ONGOING }
			clr_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_LEFTRAD_ONGOING
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_RIGHTMOD_ONGOING }
			clr_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_RIGHTMOD_ONGOING
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_RIGHTRAD_ONGOING }
			clr_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_RIGHTRAD_ONGOING
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_FIRSTTIME_LEFTMOD_DIDNT_EFFORT }
			clr_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_FIRSTTIME_LEFTMOD_DIDNT_EFFORT
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_FIRSTTIME_LEFTRAD_DIDNT_EFFORT }
			clr_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_FIRSTTIME_LEFTRAD_DIDNT_EFFORT
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_FIRSTTIME_RIGHTMOD_DIDNT_EFFORT }
			clr_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_FIRSTTIME_RIGHTMOD_DIDNT_EFFORT
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_FIRSTTIME_RIGHTRAD_DIDNT_EFFORT }
			clr_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_FIRSTTIME_RIGHTRAD_DIDNT_EFFORT
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_FIRSTTIME_LEFTMOD_MAKES_EFFORT }
			clr_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_FIRSTTIME_LEFTMOD_MAKES_EFFORT
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_FIRSTTIME_LEFTRAD_MAKES_EFFORT }
			clr_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_FIRSTTIME_LEFTRAD_MAKES_EFFORT
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_FIRSTTIME_RIGHTMOD_MAKES_EFFORT }
			clr_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_FIRSTTIME_RIGHTMOD_MAKES_EFFORT
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_FIRSTTIME_RIGHTRAD_MAKES_EFFORT }
			clr_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_FIRSTTIME_RIGHTRAD_MAKES_EFFORT
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_SGI_MEMBERS_ANTAGONISING_AMENDMENT }
			clr_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_SGI_MEMBERS_ANTAGONISING_AMENDMENT
		}
		removeflag_mdmosjap_coalition_invitation = yes
		news_event = mdmosjap_japannews.3302
	}
}

#Japan's Referendum Approved the Constitutional Amendment
news_event = {
	id = mdmosjap_japannews.3202
	title = mdmosjap_japannews.3202.t
	desc = mdmosjap_japannews.3202.d
	#picture = GFX_news_event_hearts_of_iron_4

	is_triggered_only = yes

	major = yes

	#Japan
	option = {
		trigger = {
			tag = JAP
		}
		name = mdmosjap_japannews.3202.oA
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japannews.3202.oA"
	}

	#Asia - Moderate Amendment
	option = {
		trigger = {
			AND = {
				capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia }
				NOT = { tag = JAP }
				JAP = {
					OR = {
						has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_LEFTMOD_ONGOING
						has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_RIGHTMOD_ONGOING
					}
				}
			}
		}
		name = mdmosjap_japannews.3202.oB
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japannews.3202.oB"
	}

	#Asia - Radical Left Amendment
	option = {
		trigger = {
			AND = {
				capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia }
				NOT = { tag = JAP }
				JAP = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_LEFTRAD_ONGOING }
			}
		}
		name = mdmosjap_japannews.3202.oC
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japannews.3202.oC"
	}

	#Asia - Radical Right Amendment
	option = {
		trigger = {
			AND = {
				capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia }
				NOT = { tag = JAP }
				JAP = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_RIGHTRAD_ONGOING }
			}
		}
		name = mdmosjap_japannews.3202.oD
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japannews.3202.oD"
	}

	#The others
	option = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe }
				capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east }
				capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa }
				capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia }
				capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america }
				capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america }
			}
		}
		name = mdmosjap_japannews.3202.oE
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japannews.3202.oE"
	}
}

	id = mdmosjap_japanelection.3202

	desc = mdmosjap_japanelection.3202.d

	}

#[HIDDEN]Amendment Deadline: First AFK Check
country_event = {
	id = mdmosjap_japanelection.3205
	hidden = yes

	is_triggered_only = yes

	#Nothing in 6 months -> first complaint
	option = {
		trigger = {
			AND = {
				NOT = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_NF_HOLY_ARTICLE_9 }
				NOT = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_NF_ADAPT_ARTICLE_9 }
				NOT = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_NF_ADAPT_STATE_EMERGENCY_PREROGATIVE }
				has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_AMENDMENT_DEADLINE_TICKING
			}
		}
		name = mdmosjap_japanelection.3205.oA
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japanelection.3205.oA"
		country_event = mdmosjap_japanelection.3206
	}

	#Nothing in 12 months -> second complaint
	option = {
		trigger = {
			AND = {
				NOT = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_NF_HOLY_ARTICLE_9 }
				NOT = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_NF_ADAPT_ARTICLE_9 }
				NOT = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_NF_ADAPT_STATE_EMERGENCY_PREROGATIVE }
				has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_AMENDMENT_DEADLINE_TICKING2
			}
		}
		name = mdmosjap_japanelection.3205.oB
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japanelection.3205.oB"
		country_event = mdmosjap_japanelection.3207
	}

	#Nothing in 18 months -> final complaint
	option = {
		trigger = {
			AND = {
				NOT = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_NF_HOLY_ARTICLE_9 }
				NOT = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_NF_ADAPT_ARTICLE_9 }
				NOT = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_NF_ADAPT_STATE_EMERGENCY_PREROGATIVE }
				has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_AMENDMENT_DEADLINE_TICKING3
			}
		}
		name = mdmosjap_japanelection.3205.oC
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japanelection.3205.oC"
		country_event = mdmosjap_japanelection.3208
	}

	#End Recalculation
	option = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_EVENT_REFERENDUM_AMENDMENT_DEADLINE_TICKING }
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_NF_HOLY_ARTICLE_9
				has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_NF_ADAPT_ARTICLE_9
				has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_NF_ADAPT_STATE_EMERGENCY_PREROGATIVE
			}
		}
		name = mdmosjap_japanelection.3205.EndLoop
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japanelection.3205.EndLoop"
	}
}

#3.11
country_event = {
	id = mdmosjap_japan.230311001
	title = mdmosjap_japan.230311001.t
	desc = mdmosjap_japan.230311001.d
	#picture = GFX_news_event_hearts_of_iron_4

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			617 = {
				damage_building = { type = infrastructure damage = 3.0 }
				damage_building = { type = industrial_complex damage = 4.0 }
				damage_building = { type = arms_factory damage = 2.0 }
				damage_building = { type = dockyard damage = 1.0 }
				damage_building = { type = offices damage = 1.0 }
				damage_building = { type = fuel_silo damage = 1.0 }
			}
			616 = {
				#set_demilitarized_zone = yes
				remove_building = { type = infrastructure level = 1 }
				remove_building = { type = industrial_complex level = 1 }
				damage_building = { type = infrastructure damage = 4.0 }
				damage_building = { type = industrial_complex damage = 8.0 }
				damage_building = { type = arms_factory damage = 2.0 }
				damage_building = { type = dockyard damage = 2.0 }
				damage_building = { type = offices damage = 2.0 }
				damage_building = { type = fuel_silo damage = 2.0 }
				damage_building = { type = air_base damage = 3.0 }
			}
			615 = {
				remove_building = { type = infrastructure level = 1 }
				remove_building = { type = industrial_complex level = 1 }
				damage_building = { type = infrastructure damage = 3.0 }
				damage_building = { type = industrial_complex damage = 10.0 }
				damage_building = { type = arms_factory damage = 2.0 }
				damage_building = { type = dockyard damage = 2.0 }
				damage_building = { type = offices damage = 2.0 }
				damage_building = { type = fuel_silo damage = 1.0 }
			}
			ROOT = {
				add_manpower = -18428
				add_ideas = JAP_311_pre
				set_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_311
				unlock_national_focus = JAP_3_11_disaster
				mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
			}
			news_event = mdmosjap_japannews.230311001
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = mdmosjap_japan.230311001.oA
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: mdmosjap_japan.230311001.oA"
		effect_tooltip = {
			617 = {
				damage_building = { type = infrastructure damage = 3.0 }
				damage_building = { type = industrial_complex damage = 4.0 }
				damage_building = { type = arms_factory damage = 2.0 }
				damage_building = { type = dockyard damage = 1.0 }
				damage_building = { type = offices damage = 1.0 }
				damage_building = { type = fuel_silo damage = 1.0 }
			}
			616 = {
				#set_demilitarized_zone = yes
				remove_building = { type = infrastructure level = 1 }
				remove_building = { type = industrial_complex level = 1 }
				damage_building = { type = infrastructure damage = 4.0 }
				damage_building = { type = industrial_complex damage = 8.0 }
				damage_building = { type = arms_factory damage = 2.0 }
				damage_building = { type = dockyard damage = 2.0 }
				damage_building = { type = offices damage = 2.0 }
				damage_building = { type = fuel_silo damage = 2.0 }
				damage_building = { type = air_base damage = 3.0 }
			}
			615 = {
				remove_building = { type = infrastructure level = 1 }
				remove_building = { type = industrial_complex level = 1 }
				damage_building = { type = infrastructure damage = 3.0 }
				damage_building = { type = industrial_complex damage = 10.0 }
				damage_building = { type = arms_factory damage = 2.0 }
				damage_building = { type = dockyard damage = 2.0 }
				damage_building = { type = offices damage = 2.0 }
				damage_building = { type = fuel_silo damage = 1.0 }
			}
			ROOT = {
				add_manpower = -18428
				unlock_national_focus = JAP_3_11_disaster
				add_ideas = JAP_311_pre
			}
		}
		increase_mdmosjap_concon_left_10 = yes
		decrease_mdmosjap_conrad_left_10 = yes
		decrease_mdmosjap_conrad_right_10 = yes
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = recession }
			swap_ideas = { remove_idea = recession add_idea = depression }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = stagnation }
			swap_ideas = { remove_idea = stagnation add_idea = depression }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = stable_growth }
			swap_ideas = { remove_idea = stable_growth add_idea = depression }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = fast_growth }
			swap_ideas = { remove_idea = fast_growth add_idea = depression }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = economic_boom }
			swap_ideas = { remove_idea = economic_boom add_idea = depression }
		}
	}
}

#Initial Prompt (2000)
country_event = {
	id = Japan_Demographic.100001000
	title = Japan_Demographic.100001000.t
	desc = Japan_Demographic.100001000.d
	picture = GFX_JAP_traffic

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	#Support for families
	option = {
		name = Japan_Demographic.100001000.oA
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: Japan_Demographic.100001000.oA"
		country_event = { id = Japan_Demographic.100001001 } # Demographic Crisis Initial Prompt
	}
}

#First Choice (2000)
country_event = {
	id = Japan_Demographic.100001001
	title = Japan_Demographic.100001001.t
	desc = Japan_Demographic.100001001.d

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	#Support for families
	option = {
		name = Japan_Demographic.100001001.oA
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: Japan_Demographic.100001001.oA"
		set_country_flag = JAP_DEMOGRAPHICS_CHAIN_APPEALED_CONSERVATIVES
		add_political_power = 50
		increase_social_spending = yes
		block_social_decrease = yes
		if = {
			limit = { has_socialist_government = yes }
			steal_popularity_from_conservatives = yes
		}
		else = {
			set_party_index_to_ruling_party = yes
			set_temp_variable = { party_popularity_increase = 0.03 }
			set_temp_variable = { temp_outlook_increase = 0.03 }
			add_relative_party_popularity = yes
		}
	}

	#Talk up workers' rights
	option = {
		name = Japan_Demographic.100001001.oB
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: Japan_Demographic.100001001.oB"
		set_country_flag = JAP_DEMOGRAPHICS_CHAIN_APPEALED_PROGRESSIVES
		add_political_power = -50
		add_stability = -0.02
		if = {
			limit = { has_economically_liberal_government = yes }
			steal_popularity_from_progressives = yes
			set_temp_variable = { temp_opinion = -5 }
			change_small_medium_business_owners_opinion = yes
			change_industrial_conglomerates_opinion = yes
			change_international_bankers_opinion = yes
		}
		else = {
			set_party_index_to_ruling_party = yes
			set_temp_variable = { party_popularity_increase = 0.03 }
			set_temp_variable = { temp_outlook_increase = 0.03 }
			add_relative_party_popularity = yes
		}
	}
}

#Conservatives Demand More
country_event = {
	id = Japan_Demographic.100001002
	title = Japan_Demographic.100001002.t
	desc = Japan_Demographic.100001002.d

	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		tag = JAP
		has_country_flag = JAP_DEMOGRAPHICS_CHAIN_APPEALED_CONSERVATIVES
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 365
		modifier = {
			has_stability < 0.5
			factor = 0.2
		}
		modifier = { # if economy stays healthy, stay off player's back
			has_idea = fast_growth
			factor = 3
		}
		modifier = { # if economy stays healthy, stay off player's back
			has_idea = economic_boom
			factor = 5
		}
	}

	#Accept
	option = {
		name = Japan_Demographic.100001002.oA
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: Japan_Demographic.100001002.oA"
		set_temp_variable = { corp_change = -3 }
		modify_corporate_tax_rate_effect = yes
		set_temp_variable = { temp_opinion = 5 }
		change_small_medium_business_owners_opinion = yes
		change_industrial_conglomerates_opinion = yes
		change_international_bankers_opinion = yes
	}

	#Stuff it!
	option = {
		name = Japan_Demographic.100001002.oB
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: Japan_Demographic.100001002.oB"
		add_political_power = -150
		set_temp_variable = { temp_opinion = -10 }
		change_small_medium_business_owners_opinion = yes
		change_industrial_conglomerates_opinion = yes
		change_international_bankers_opinion = yes
		set_party_index_to_ruling_party = yes
		set_temp_variable = { party_popularity_increase = -0.01 }
		set_temp_variable = { temp_outlook_increase = -0.01 }
		add_relative_party_popularity = yes
	}
}

#Progressives Demand More
country_event = {
	id = Japan_Demographic.100001003
	title = Japan_Demographic.100001003.t
	desc = Japan_Demographic.100001003.d

	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		tag = JAP
		has_economically_liberal_government = yes
		has_country_flag = JAP_DEMOGRAPHICS_CHAIN_APPEALED_PROGRESSIVES
		NOT = {
			has_completed_focus = JAP_protect_worker_rights #player can avoid this if going Jap Soc. INDICATE THIS
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 365
		modifier = {
			has_stability < 0.5
			factor = 0.6
		}
	}

	#No way!
	option = {
		name = Japan_Demographic.100001003.oA
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: Japan_Demographic.100001003.oA"
		set_party_index_to_ruling_party = yes
		set_temp_variable = { party_popularity_increase = -0.10 }
		set_temp_variable = { temp_outlook_increase = -0.10 }
		add_relative_party_popularity = yes
	}

	#Accept union interests
	option = {
		name = Japan_Demographic.100001003.oB
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: Japan_Demographic.100001003.oB"
		add_political_power = -300
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = industrial_conglomerates
			}
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = industrial_conglomerates
				add_idea = labour_unions
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = { party_index = 0 }
		set_temp_variable = { party_popularity_increase = 0.03 }
		add_relative_party_popularity = yes
		set_temp_variable = { party_index = 7 }
		set_temp_variable = { party_popularity_increase = 0.02 }
		set_temp_variable = { temp_outlook_increase = 0.02 }
		add_relative_party_popularity = yes
		set_temp_variable = { party_index = 15 }
		set_temp_variable = { party_popularity_increase = 0.02 }
		set_temp_variable = { temp_outlook_increase = 0.02 }
		add_relative_party_popularity = yes
		set_temp_variable = { party_index = 20 }
		set_temp_variable = { party_popularity_increase = 0.03 }
		set_temp_variable = { temp_outlook_increase = 0.03 }
		add_relative_party_popularity = yes
		set_temp_variable = { party_index = 21 }
		set_temp_variable = { party_popularity_increase = 0.03 }
		set_temp_variable = { temp_outlook_increase = 0.03 }
		add_relative_party_popularity = yes
	}
}

#First Reminder Gate (2001)
country_event = {
	id = Japan_Demographic.100002001
	hidden = yes

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	#Add any flags that should be set for bonus reforms so the player gets accurate info
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = social_05
			}
			set_variable = { jap_demographics_welfare_reform_bonus = 1 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = social_06
			}
			set_variable = { jap_demographics_welfare_reform_bonus = 2 }
		}
		else = {
			set_variable = { jap_demographics_welfare_reform_bonus = 0 }
		}
		set_variable = { jap_demographics_effective_depopulation_reform = 0 }
		add_to_variable = { jap_demographics_effective_depopulation_reform = jap_demographics_depopulation_reform }
		add_to_variable = { jap_demographics_effective_depopulation_reform = jap_demographics_welfare_reform_bonus }
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: Japan_Demographic.100002001.oA"
		if = { #Fix both! Don't need to be more specific here
			limit = {
				AND = {
					check_variable = { jap_demographics_centralization_reform < 2 }
					check_variable = { jap_demographics_effective_depopulation_reform < 2 }
				}
			}
			JAP = { country_event = Japan_Demographic.100002002 }
		} else_if = { #Centralization OK, fix depop!
			limit = {
				AND = {
					check_variable = { jap_demographics_centralization_reform > 1 }
					check_variable = { jap_demographics_effective_depopulation_reform < 2 }
				}
			}
			JAP = { country_event = Japan_Demographic.100002003 }
		} else_if = { #Depopulation OK, fix centralization!
		limit = {
			AND = {
				check_variable = { jap_demographics_centralization_reform < 2 }
				check_variable = { jap_demographics_effective_depopulation_reform > 1 }
			}
		}
			JAP = { country_event = Japan_Demographic.100002004 }
		} else = { #Doing great!
			JAP = { country_event = Japan_Demographic.100002005 }
		}
	}
}

#First Reminder, Fix Both! (2001)
country_event = {
	id = Japan_Demographic.100002002
	title = Japan_Demographic.100002002.t
	desc = Japan_Demographic.100002002.d
	picture = GFX_JAP_traffic

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	#Promise everything!
	option = {
		name = Japan_Demographic.100002002.oA
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: Japan_Demographic.100002002.oA"
		add_political_power = -100
		set_temp_variable = { temp_opinion = -5 }
		change_small_medium_business_owners_opinion = yes
		change_industrial_conglomerates_opinion = yes
		change_international_bankers_opinion = yes
		set_party_index_to_ruling_party = yes
		set_temp_variable = { party_popularity_increase = -0.02 }
		set_temp_variable = { temp_outlook_increase = -0.02 }
		add_relative_party_popularity = yes
	}

	#Do something!!
	option = {
		name = Japan_Demographic.100002002.oB
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: Japan_Demographic.100002002.oB"
		increase_social_spending = yes
		block_social_decrease = yes
		set_country_flag = { flag = large_company_subsidies value = 1 days = 180 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = propaganda_campaign_costs_tt
		ingame_update_setup = yes
	}

	#Opposition Discredits Us!
	option = {
		name = Japan_Demographic.100002002.oC
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: Japan_Demographic.100002002.oC"
		set_party_index_to_ruling_party = yes
		set_temp_variable = { party_popularity_increase = -0.1 }
		set_temp_variable = { temp_outlook_increase = -0.1 }
		add_relative_party_popularity = yes
	}
}

#First Demographics Checkup Gate (2002)
#This gives a player a heads up that the two reform checkups are following
country_event = {
	id = Japan_Demographic.100003000
	title = Japan_Demographic.100003000.t
	desc = Japan_Demographic.100003000.d

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	#Add any flags that should be set for bonus reforms before the player can react and cheat
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = social_05
			}
			set_variable = { jap_demographics_welfare_reform_bonus = 1 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = social_06
			}
			set_variable = { jap_demographics_welfare_reform_bonus = 2 }
		}
		else = {
			set_variable = { jap_demographics_welfare_reform_bonus = 0 }
		}
		set_variable = { jap_demographics_effective_depopulation_reform = 0 }
		add_to_variable = { jap_demographics_effective_depopulation_reform = jap_demographics_depopulation_reform }
		add_to_variable = { jap_demographics_effective_depopulation_reform = jap_demographics_welfare_reform_bonus }

		# set the initial offset for the main sequence chain... it will subsequently be every 2 years
		set_country_flag = JAP_DEMOGRAPHICS_FIRST_PHASE_DONE
		set_country_flag = { flag = JAP_DEMOGRAPHICS_REMINDER_SEMAPHORE days = 365 value = 1 } # in 1 year
		set_country_flag = { flag = JAP_DEMOGRAPHICS_CHECKUP_SEMAPHORE days = 730 value = 1 } # in 2 years (730 days)
	}

	# Let's hope we did our best...
	option = {
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: Japan_Demographic.100003000.oA"
		hidden_effect = {
			JAP = { country_event = Japan_Demographic.100003100 } #take us to the Centralization Checkup Gate
		}
	}
}

#First Centralization Checkup Gate (2002)
#This is more gentle in consequences than the main sequence checkups
country_event = {
	id = Japan_Demographic.100003100
	hidden = yes

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: Japan_Demographic.100003100.oA"
		if = { #You blew it!!
			limit = {
				check_variable = { jap_demographics_centralization_reform < 1 }
			}
			JAP = { country_event = Japan_Demographic.100003101 }
		} else_if = { #Problems ahead!
			limit = {
				check_variable = { jap_demographics_centralization_reform < 2 }
			}
			JAP = { country_event = Japan_Demographic.100003102 }
		} else = { #Doing great!
			JAP = { country_event = Japan_Demographic.100003103 }
		}
	}
}

	id = Japan_Demographic.100003101
	title = Japan_Demographic.100003101.t
	desc = Japan_Demographic.100003101.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	#Damn!
	option = {
		name = Japan_Demographic.100003101.oA
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: Japan_Demographic.100003101.oA"
		add_political_power = -100
		set_temp_variable = { temp_opinion = -5 }
		change_small_medium_business_owners_opinion = yes
		change_industrial_conglomerates_opinion = yes
		change_international_bankers_opinion = yes
		set_party_index_to_ruling_party = yes
		set_temp_variable = { party_popularity_increase = -0.05 }
		set_temp_variable = { temp_outlook_increase = -0.05 }
		add_relative_party_popularity = yes
		JAP_demographics_centralization_increase_1 = yes
		JAP = { country_event = Japan_Demographic.100003200 }
	}

	#Pressure Ministers to Resign
	option = {
		name = Japan_Demographic.100003101.oB
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: Japan_Demographic.100003101.oB"
		add_political_power = -300
		set_party_index_to_ruling_party = yes
		set_temp_variable = { party_popularity_increase = -0.02 }
		set_temp_variable = { temp_outlook_increase = -0.02 }
		add_relative_party_popularity = yes
		JAP_demographics_centralization_increase_1 = yes

	}

	#Opposition Promises to Fix!

		change_international_bankers_opinion = yes

#First Depopulation Checkup, No Problems
country_event = {
	id = Japan_Demographic.100003203
	title = Japan_Demographic.100003203.t
	desc = Japan_Demographic.100003203.d

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	#Great!
	option = {
		name = Japan_Demographic.100003203.oA
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: Japan_Demographic.100003203.oA"
		add_political_power = 50
		set_party_index_to_ruling_party = yes
		set_temp_variable = { party_popularity_increase = 0.05 }
		set_temp_variable = { temp_outlook_increase = 0.05 }
		add_relative_party_popularity = yes
	}

	#Extend our program!
	option = {
		name = Japan_Demographic.100003203.oB
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: Japan_Demographic.100003203.oB"
		increase_social_spending = yes
		set_temp_variable = { corp_change = 2 }
		modify_corporate_tax_rate_effect = yes
		set_temp_variable = { pop_change = 2 }
		modify_population_tax_rate_effect = yes
		if = { #only if eco conservative
			limit = { has_economically_liberal_government = yes }
			steal_popularity_from_progressives = yes
		}
		else = {
			set_party_index_to_ruling_party = yes
			set_temp_variable = { party_popularity_increase = 0.03 }
			set_temp_variable = { temp_outlook_increase = 0.03 }
			add_relative_party_popularity = yes
		}
	}

	#Amend the budget
	option = {
		name = Japan_Demographic.100003203.oC
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: Japan_Demographic.100003203.oC"
		add_political_power = 100
		set_temp_variable = { corp_change = -3 }
		modify_corporate_tax_rate_effect = yes
		set_temp_variable = { treasury_change = 50 }
		modify_treasury_effect = yes
		if = { #only if not already conservative
			limit = { has_socialist_government = yes }
			steal_popularity_from_conservatives = yes
		}
		else = {
			set_party_index_to_ruling_party = yes
			set_temp_variable = { party_popularity_increase = 0.03 }
			set_temp_variable = { temp_outlook_increase = 0.03 }
			add_relative_party_popularity = yes
		}
	}
}

#Main Sequence Reminder Gate (Every odd year after 2002)
country_event = {
	id = Japan_Demographic.100004001
	hidden = yes

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# want this to stop firing when the player defeats this mechanic
	trigger = {
		AND = { # neither of these can be true
			NOT = { # does not have both centralization and depopulation minimized
				has_idea = JAP_centralization_0
				has_idea = JAP_depopulation_0
			}
			NOT = { # has not completed the reform
				has_idea = JAP_demographics_finished
			}
		}
	}

	#Add any flags that should be set for bonus reforms so the player gets accurate info
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = social_05
			}
			set_variable = { jap_demographics_welfare_reform_bonus = 1 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = social_06
			}
			set_variable = { jap_demographics_welfare_reform_bonus = 2 }
		}
		else = {
			set_variable = { jap_demographics_welfare_reform_bonus = 0 }
		}
		set_variable = { jap_demographics_effective_depopulation_reform = 0 }
		add_to_variable = { jap_demographics_effective_depopulation_reform = jap_demographics_depopulation_reform }
		add_to_variable = { jap_demographics_effective_depopulation_reform = jap_demographics_welfare_reform_bonus }
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: Japan_Demographic.100004001.oA"
		if = { #Fix both! Don't need to be more specific here
			limit = {
				AND = {
					check_variable = { jap_demographics_centralization_reform < 3 }
					check_variable = { jap_demographics_effective_depopulation_reform < 3 }
				}
			}
			JAP = { country_event = Japan_Demographic.100004002 }
		} else_if = { #Centralization OK, fix depop!
			limit = {
				AND = {
					check_variable = { jap_demographics_centralization_reform > 4 }
					check_variable = { jap_demographics_effective_depopulation_reform < 6 }
				}
			}
			JAP = { country_event = Japan_Demographic.100004003 }
		} else_if = { #Depopulation OK, fix centralization!
		limit = {
			AND = {
				check_variable = { jap_demographics_centralization_reform < 5 }
				check_variable = { jap_demographics_effective_depopulation_reform > 5 }
			}
		}
			JAP = { country_event = Japan_Demographic.100004004 }
		} else = { #Doing great!
			JAP = { country_event = Japan_Demographic.100004005 }
		}
	}
}

#Main Sequence Reminder, Fix Both! (Every odd year after 2002)
country_event = {
	id = Japan_Demographic.100004002
	title = Japan_Demographic.100004002.t
	desc = Japan_Demographic.100004002.d
	picture = GFX_JAP_traffic

	is_triggered_only = yes

	#Promise everything!
	option = {
		name = Japan_Demographic.100004002.oA
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: Japan_Demographic.100004002.oA"
		add_political_power = -100
		set_temp_variable = { temp_opinion = -5 }
		change_small_medium_business_owners_opinion = yes
		change_industrial_conglomerates_opinion = yes
		change_international_bankers_opinion = yes
		set_party_index_to_ruling_party = yes
		set_temp_variable = { party_popularity_increase = -0.02 }
		set_temp_variable = { temp_outlook_increase = -0.02 }
		add_relative_party_popularity = yes
	}

	#Do something!!
	option = {
		name = Japan_Demographic.100004002.oB
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: Japan_Demographic.100004002.oB"
		increase_social_spending = yes
		block_social_decrease = yes
		set_country_flag = { flag = large_company_subsidies value = 1 days = 180 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = propaganda_campaign_costs_tt
		ingame_update_setup = yes
	}

	#Opposition Discredits Us!
	option = {
		name = Japan_Demographic.100004002.oC
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: Japan_Demographic.100004002.oC"
		set_party_index_to_ruling_party = yes
		set_temp_variable = { party_popularity_increase = -0.1 }
		set_temp_variable = { temp_outlook_increase = -0.1 }
		add_relative_party_popularity = yes
	}
}

#Demographics Main Sequence Checkup Gate (Every even year after 2002)
#This gives a player a heads up that the two reform checkups are following
country_event = {
	id = Japan_Demographic.100005000
	title = Japan_Demographic.100005000.t
	desc = Japan_Demographic.100005000.d
	picture = GFX_JAP_traffic

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# want this to stop firing when the player defeats this mechanic
	trigger = {
		AND = { # neither of these can be true
			NOT = { # does not have both centralization and depopulation minimized
				has_idea = JAP_centralization_0
				has_idea = JAP_depopulation_0
			}
			NOT = { # has not completed the reform
				has_idea = JAP_demographics_finished
			}
		}
	}

	#Add any flags that should be set for bonus reforms before the player can react and cheat
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = social_05
			}
			set_variable = { jap_demographics_welfare_reform_bonus = 1 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = social_06
			}
			set_variable = { jap_demographics_welfare_reform_bonus = 2 }
		}
		else = {
			set_variable = { jap_demographics_welfare_reform_bonus = 0 }
		}
		set_variable = { jap_demographics_effective_depopulation_reform = 0 }
		add_to_variable = { jap_demographics_effective_depopulation_reform = jap_demographics_depopulation_reform }
		add_to_variable = { jap_demographics_effective_depopulation_reform = jap_demographics_welfare_reform_bonus }
	}

	# Let's hope we did our best...
	option = {
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: Japan_Demographic.100005000.oA"
		hidden_effect = {
			JAP = { country_event = Japan_Demographic.100005100 }
		}
	}
}

#Main Sequence Centralization Checkup Gate

	id = Japan_Demographic.100005100
	hidden = yes

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: Japan_Demographic.100005100.oA"
		if = { #Scandal!
			limit = {
				check_variable = { jap_demographics_centralization_reform < 3 }
			}
			JAP = { country_event = Japan_Demographic.100005101 }
		} else_if = { #Things get worse!
			limit = {
				check_variable = { jap_demographics_centralization_reform < 5 }
			}
			JAP = { country_event = Japan_Demographic.100005102 }
		} else = { #Things improve!
			JAP = { country_event = Japan_Demographic.100005103 }
		}
	}
}

#Demographics Resolution, Centralization Done
country_event = {
	id = Japan_Demographic.100006001
	title = Japan_Demographic.100006001.t
	desc = Japan_Demographic.100006001.d

	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		tag = JAP
		has_idea = JAP_centralization_0
	}

	#Great!
	option = {
		trigger = {
			tag = JAP
			NOT = {
				has_idea = JAP_depopulation_0
			}
		}
		name = Japan_Demographic.100006001.oA
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: Japan_Demographic.100006001.oA"
		add_stability = 0.02
	}
	#Optimize our reform policies!
	option = {
		trigger = {
			tag = JAP
			has_idea = JAP_depopulation_0
		}
		name = Japan_Demographic.100006001.oB
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: Japan_Demographic.100006001.oB"
		JAP = { country_event = Japan_Demographic.100006003 }
	}
}

#Demographics Resolution, Depopulation Done

	id = Japan_Demographic.100006002
	title = Japan_Demographic.100006002.t
	desc = Japan_Demographic.100006002.d

		tag = JAP
		has_idea = JAP_depopulation_0
		NOT = {

		}
	}

	#Great!

			tag = JAP
			NOT = {
				has_idea = JAP_centralization_0
			}
		}
		name = Japan_Demographic.100006002.oA
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: Japan_Demographic.100006002.oA"
		add_stability = 0.02
	}
	#Optimize our reform policies!

		trigger = {
			tag = JAP
			has_idea = JAP_centralization_0
		}
		name = Japan_Demographic.100006001.oB
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: Japan_Demographic.100006001.oB"
		JAP = { country_event = Japan_Demographic.100006003 }
	}
}

	}

#[KATO] Start of Kato Rebellion Scenario
#Gate, when triggered chooses between an event or nothing, and sets one of two flags either way
country_event = {
	id = mdmosjap_EDT.120412001
	hidden = yes

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				JAP = {
					OR = {
						is_in_array = { ruling_party = 0 }
						is_in_array = { ruling_party = 1 }
						is_in_array = { ruling_party = 7 }
					}
				}
			}
			JAP = {
				country_event = mdmosjap_japan_kato.1
				set_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_KATO_REBELLION_EXECUTED
			}
		} else = {
			JAP = { set_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_KATO_REBELLION_AVERTED }
		}
	}
}

#Battle of Amamioshima
#Gate, when triggered fires multiple events simultaneously
country_event = {
	id = mdmosjap_EDT.131222001
	hidden = yes

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		NKO = {
			exists = yes
			has_country_leader = { name = "Kim Jong-il" }
		}
		JAP = {
			NOT = { has_completed_focus = JAP_visit_north }
		}
	}

	option = {
		NKO = { country_event = mdmosjap_japan.131222001 }
		JAP = { country_event = mdmosjap_japan.131222002 }
	}
}

#The Min-Yu Amalgamation
#Gate, when triggered chooses between two events
country_event = {
	id = mdmosjap_EDT.150927001
	hidden = yes

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				JAP = {
					has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_LP		#LP has been collapsed
					OR = {								#LP is not ruling party, or ruling party is DPJ but no coalition with LP
						NOT = { is_in_array = { ruling_party = 15 } }
						AND = {
							is_in_array = { ruling_party = 2 }
							NOT = { is_in_array = { gov_coalition_array = 15 } }
						}
					}
				}
			}
			JAP = { country_event = mdmosjap_japan.150927001 }
		} else = {
			JAP = { country_event = { id = mdmosjap_japan.150927003 days = 14 } }
		}
	}
}

#[KATO] The unsuccessfulness of Yamasaki
#Gate, when triggered chooses between two events
country_event = {
	id = mdmosjap_EDT.151110001
	hidden = yes

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

			JAP = { country_event = mdmosjap_japan_kato.851 }		#Taku Yamasaki left the Diet
		} else_if = {
			limit = { JAP = { has_country_leader = { name = "Taku Yamasaki" } } }
			JAP = { country_event = mdmosjap_japan_kato.853 }		#P.M. Taku Yamasaki will be removed
		}
	}
}

#Resign of Koizumi
#Gate, when triggered chooses between two events
country_event = {
	id = mdmosjap_EDT.180926001
	hidden = yes

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		JAP = { has_country_leader = { name = "Junichiro Koizumi" } }
	}

	option = {
		if = {
			limit = { JAP = { NOT = { has_country_flag = MDMOSJAP_POSTAL_PRIVATISATION } } }
			JAP = { country_event = mdmosjap_japan.180926002 }
		} else = {
			JAP = { country_event = mdmosjap_japan.180926001 }
		}
	}
}
